111546.headline: Native speaking Spanish teacher
111546.shortBio: I am an internationally experienced Spanish teacher working with students from the US, UK, Japan, Taiwan and Brazil. Teaching is nice and I love it, I've been writing for a while, I love literature and literature. Since studying at my university, I have wanted to share my literary and cultural knowledge with many people.

seoReview.author: Frank
seoReview.content: exciting and insightful learning experience with Cristian Camilo, can only recommend ! Uses a variety of different learning methods to keep his students motivated and active!

tutorTags.description: My professional experience as a teacher and as an advertising editor has allowed me to know every aspect of my language, therefore I have a great technical knowledge of the Spanish language and I’m able to share with all my students.
I’ve worked for many years in a corporate environment and as a professional my self I’m able to help my students to communicate clearly and professionaly in Spanish.
I am latino and I love my culture. Since I was born and raised in Latin America, I’m definitely qualified to teach Español Latinoamericano, and not only that, but also our culture.
Spanish is an interesting language, that is why it is important to know all its aspects, I like to teach the basics and advanced of it and see the progress of my students.
During my experience I have developed Spanish classes that contain the most important elements of Spanish so that students build knowledge, learn and improve faster.
I love seeing that more people want to learn my language, so I really enjoy helping students with no previous knowledge of the Spanish language to reach a more fluid conversational level.
I believe it’s important to listen to my students so they can practice their speaking skills and grow in confidence and fluency, as I help them with pronunciation and vocabulary.
I work with excellent materials and relevant study contents that can effectively help students develop a great knowledge of Business Spanish.

920206.headline: Certified tutor with 10 years of experience
920206.shortBio:
I am a spanish teacher for foreigners with experience in both schools (uk) and private classes for children and adults.
I am methodical and practical.  I combine theory with colloquiums to help teach.
I am demanding when preparing for official exams. I put in homework.

tutorTags.description: He trabajado en el extranjero enseñando español como materia optativa en colegios.
Soy nativa de español y Castellana, por lo que no aprenderás mejor el español que de una castellana.
Nos fijamos un objetivo y nos preparamos para ello; tanto si es para superar un examen como si es por alguna otra necesidad.
Empezamos aprendiendo lo básico desde 0, tanto hablado como escrito.
me gusta preparar a los alumnos haciendo coloquios de situaciones reales.
Soy profesora de DELE desde hace más de 10 años.
Los niños absorben muy rápido los conocimientos y trabajar con ellos es muy divertido y se aprende mucho.
Soy licenciada en Administración y dirección de empresas a parte de profesora de español, por lo que domino el mundo de los negocios y su terminología.

2827322.headline: Zertifizierter Lehrer mit Jahren Erfarung
2827322.shortBio: Hallo, mein Name ist Alejandro, ich bin in Argentinien geboren (Tango, Fußball und Matetee) und lebe in Spanien. Ich liebe Sprachen (ich spreche Deutsch und Englisch), Reisen, Kultur, Musik und Literatur. Ich freue mich darauf, Menschen helfen zu können, meine Sprache zu lernen, etwas über die Bräuche spanischsprachiger Länder zu lernen und zu sehen, wie sie ihre Ziele erreichen.

tutorTags.description: Me he formado en las mejores Universidades de Argentina, en derecho, especialmente en derecho penal, alcanzando el grado de Doctor (PhD), desempeñándome como titular de cátedra en grado, posgrado y doctorado, tanto en la Universidad de Buenos Aires (UBA), como en la USAL (Universidad del Salvador, de orientación Jesuita). Tengo amplia experiencia para poder enseñar español jurídico, como también jurídico penal.

Vivo hace un tiempo en España, donde tengo muchos amigos y contacto con la cultura del lugar, por lo cual, puedo ayudar a quien se interese por esta variante del idioma Español, los modismos, los giros idiomáticos, pronunciación, cultura, etc.

He nacido en Argentina y viajado por Latinoamérica (Uruguay, Perú, Cuba, etc.) teniendo contacto permanente con amigos de toda América Latina, conociendo por ello, los modismos de cada país, tanto en el idioma coloquial, como en el formal y de negocios.

He viajado tanto por Latinoamérica, como por Estados Unidos de Norteamérica y Europa, en diversas oportunidades, teniendo contacto con las culturas, costumbres, comidas, bailes, etc., por eso dispongo de una amplia gama de recursos para guiar al estudiante en los conocimientos generales de la lengua española.

Los años de experiencia, con alumnos de diferentes nacionalidades y edades permiten tener recursos didácticos atractivos para conducir el proceso de aprendizaje a quienes están dando sus primeros pasos en el español. La paciencia, el estimulo constante, hacen que sean agradables las clases.

Mas de veinte años dictando clases universitarias, me permiten tener una vasta experiencia metodológica para hacer fácil y ameno el aprendizaje. Utilizar vocabulario preciso y diverso, en función a las áreas de interés del alumno. Manejo español latinoamericano, pues soy argentino y también la variante Ibérica, pues vivo en España.

Mi nivel educativo es el Universitario, poseo grado de Doctor en Derecho (PhD) donde he dictado clases e interactuado en el apasionante mundo de los negocios, por lo cual, conozco estilos de abordar una conversación, manejar lenguaje directo o sutil en una charla de negocios o bien en el proceso mismo de una negociación. Como rechazar con educación una propuesta, como hacer una contrapropuesta exitosa, etc.

1339663.headline: Certified tutor with 2 years of experience teaching Spanish
1339663.shortBio:
Hello, my name is Hugo and I am a medical student and a Spanish teacher at Preply. I am from Zaragoza but since I started studying the degree, I live in Barcelona, ​​so I have a neutral accent that is easy to understand. 
I have been teaching Spanish to European students for 2 years, who have finished with excellent results in their university exams.

seoReview.author: Finn
seoReview.content: Hugo is always well prepared, patient, and invested in the student's journey of learning Spanish.

tutorTags.description: Enseñanza del español utilizado en el ámbito laboral, asi como preparación de entrevistas de trabajo.
Enseñanza del español hablado en España, tanto sus expresiones mas utilizadas como su acento. Además te enseñaré las diferencias en el idioma entre todas las regiones.
Para mejorar en todos los aspectos de tu español: habilidades de conversación, gramática, vocabulario y español escrito.
Curso intensivo de español para que el progreso en el aprendizaje de este idioma sea mas rápido y eficaz.
Mejora de las habilidades comunicativas mediante ejercicios específicos para aumentar la fluidez al hablar y entender la forma de hablar de los españoles.

Preparación del examen DELE mediante la realización de un programa especifico de entrenamiento para aprender técnicas y estrategias para afrontar mejor el examen. Se realizarán también tests para comprobar el progreso.
Nos centraremos en los ejercicios que suelen ser mas problemáticos para los estudiantes de la asignatura de español.

1336453.headline: Spanish-speaking certified tutor in Language and Communication
1336453.shortBio:
I greet you dear reader wherever you are!
My name is Juan Bautista. I was born in Mexico and I am a graduate of Human Sciences and Philosophy.
I celebrate with you the present opportunity to be your tutor in Spanish to help you improve and expand your skills and knowledge in your communication for life and work.

seoReview.author: Brian
seoReview.content: Very helpful and cares about student progress.

tutorTags.description: Como profesional conozco el lenguaje para profesionales
Conoceremos sinónimos y modismos de algunas variantes del español dentro de México conforme a los interés de tí como estudiante.
Mi experiencia como tutor y facilitador del aprendizaje ha sido certificada por el Instituto Nacional de Educación para Adultos.
Abordaremos simultáneamente, lectura, escritura, conversación y pronunciación, aclarando las dudas al momento.
Comenzaremos por conocer reglas básicas de gramática de la lengua español y, a la vez, aprenderemos la pronunciación correcta.

Los temas a tratar serán de tu interés como estudiante en los que no sólo podrás aprender y/o mejorar tu conversación sino que abordaremos el conocimiento de algunos usos y costumbres de diversas culturas en México.

1799727.headline: Native Spanish tutor without accent and language expert
1799727.shortBio:
Welcome to my profile, the right place to improve your Spanish in an easy and fun way. And you will achieve it by practicing with me! Will I see you in class?
Hello! My name is Juan Camilo, a professional in Philosophy and Literature. I am a Spanish, English, and French teacher in my hometown, Medellín, Colombia.

seoReview.author: Arthur
seoReview.content: Très bon prof

tutorTags.description: Este español es bastante conocido en todo Latinoamérica, en especial Colombia, pues somos (mexicanos y colombianos) naciones que comparten cierto gusto por el trato amable y atento, la música y, en cierta manera, la idiosincrasia.
Colombia es mi país natal, por lo tanto domino con claridad y eficiencia las variaciones lingüísticas tanto de mi región, Antioquia, como de otras áreas de la nación.
Domino el español como área de conocimiento, pues mi formación académica fue en esta lengua.
Formo personas que necesiten desempeñarse en negocios, de forma eficiente.
Me gradué de Filosofía y mi área menor era la literatura. Así que autores, como temas de la Literatura Española me son suficientemente conocidos.

El español es una lengua multicultural y es la tercera lengua más hablada del mundo. Así que los profesionales interesados en instruirse a fondo en esta lengua, cuentan con la posibilidad de alcanzar un mejor nivel.
Conozco y comprendo el Español de España, lugar de nacimiento de la lengua de gran parte de los países que componen Latinoamérica.
Soy de Medellín, Colombia, por lo que conozco bien los diferentes acentos y expresiones de diferentes culturas. Desde México hasta la Argentina.
El español que se habla tanto en Latinoamérica como en España no tiene variaciones significantes, más allá de los respectivos acentos y usos de nuevas palabras.

En un nivel de Español intensivo se refuerzan diferentes competencias como la escrita, la oral, la escucha y la lectura. Todo ello con el fin de hacer que el estudiante abarque todos los aspectos necesarios para sentirse a gusto con su español.
El español puede parecer una difícil de conjugar o de memorizar, por ello quienes no sepan mucho tienen la posibilidad de aprender lo básico y no aburrirse en el intento.
Mi interés es que el estudiante aprenda no solo con las bases de la gramática, sino por medio de una conversación amena y formativa. Se aprende haciendo o, en este caso, hablando.
Al tener empatía y paciencia con los niños, suelo enseñar de manera divertida y formativa.

2702929.headline: Friendly certified tutor that will take your Spanish to the next level.
2702929.shortBio:
Hello! My name is Jorge and I'm 24 years old. I'm from Ecuador and I'm a Spanish teacher and tutor. I like to read about other country's history and interact with people from other nationalities and get to know a little more about their culture.
I'm relatively new in teaching a language in a professional setting.

tutorTags.description: The subject that I'm specialized in is the Spanish language and all its skills involved: reading, listening, speaking, writing and grammar.

As I'm from Ecuador, I'm a native speaker of Latin American Spanish. I feel very confident teaching different sayings and idiomatic expressions we have in my country. I also know some popular expressions from other Latin American countries such as Colombia, Venezuela, Mexico, Cuba, Argentina, Chile, Nicaragua and Costa Rica.

I have experience teaching general Spanish or the language for daily activities to be able to survive in a Spanish-speaking country in an average day with multiples activities such as: doing the shopping, going to the bank, asking for directions, going to the doctor's, etc.

The experience I have had teaching Spanish has been with people that start from the basic level, basic sentence structures and basic vocabulary. I have not taught to people with a higher level (B2 and above). For this reason, I feel more confident teaching Spanish for beginners.

I like to provide students the opportunity to talk about something that interests them during the class. I prepare lessons based on their interests and before talking, we learn new vocabulary and practice grammar structures if necessary.

I'm relatively new in teaching a language in a professional setting.

I have also lived and studied in two Spanish-speaking countries: Spain and Mexico.

seoReview.author: Jahaziel
seoReview.content:
Me encantó mi clase con Iren. En primer lugar porque ella es una persona super agradable, amable y divertida, lo que hace que su clase sea amena y el tiempo pase volando. 
Soy mexicano, por lo tanto, soy hablante nativo del español y puedo decir sin temor a equivocarme, que Iren habla como nativa. Ella es muy profesional y sus clases son personalizadas y se nota que en realidad le importa que sus estudiantes aprendan. ¡Ojalá hubiera tenido maestros como ella durante mi formación académica!.

I really liked my class with Iren. Firstly because she is a very nice, easy going, and fun person, what makes her class very nice that you feel that the time flies. 
I'm Mexican, therefore my native language is Spanish, so I can say that she speaks as native of Spanish as well.
She is so professional and her classes are customized and it is obvious that she cares that her students learn. 
I wish I had teachers like her when I was in school!

Si quieres hablar español para hacer amigos, vivir en territorios de habla española, puedes mejorar esta lengua de una forma sencilla y divertida.
Enseñanza del español para mejorar el nivel principal.
Enseñanza del español desde el nivel básico. Gramática, vocabulario y pronunciación.

Método dinámico y práctico. Con recursos y ejercicios. 
Enseñanza del español a través de diálogos, ejercicios.
Profesora con experiencia en Español para extranjeros en Academias privadas.

1186419.headline: Certified DELE examinator. Easy and personalized!
1186419.shortBio:
PLEASE, WRITE ME BEFORE BOOKING A TRIAL LESSON SO WE CAN FIND AN HOUR THAT FITS BOTH :)
My name is José, I'm 28 years old and I love languages. My hobbies are singing, playing guitar, drawing, writing and taking care of my plants. I'm not very sporty, but I love riding my bike in the nature.

seoReview.author: Emilio
seoReview.content: The lessons with José are always fun and useful. It’s clear that he has passion for teaching and he makes you want to improve every time more. Moreover he prepares for every lessons exercise adapted at your needs. He also great in teaching grammar in a way that is easy and fun. Highly recommended!

tutorTags.description: Si lo que necesitas es aprender español de España, soy el profesor que buscas. Durante mi máster escribí varios ensayos sobre las variedades lingüísticas del español y, además, mi tesis se centró en la variedad del español de mi región, Galicia.

Tanto en el centro ISA (Sevilla) como en el Instituto Giovanni XXIII (Villa San Giovanni, Italia) he podido trabajar con estudiantes primerizos de diferentes procedencias (Estados Unidos, China e Italia), todos ellos partiendo de un nivel inicial.

He sido asistente de conversación en Italia durante un año. Como hablante nativo de español y estudiante de lenguas, puedo ayudarte a mejorar tu conversación de la manera que mejor se ajuste a tus necesidades y aptitudes.
Soy examinador oficial del DELE del Instituto Cervantes desde 2019. He realizado todos los cursos desde el nivel A1 hasta el C1, incluyendo los cursos para escolares. ¡Prepárate conmigo!
En Italia trabajé como profesor para niños de entre 9 y 12 años. También he dado clases de inglés, latín y griego clásico a adolescentes.

My name is Miriam and I come from Barcelona.
I work as a Spanish teacher in schools, companies and doing private lessons.
My lessons are very flexible and constantly changing because they are personalized: they are based on the student's tastes, needs and learning styles.

She is always encouraging and that, too, is a huge benefit of working with her. I cannot recommend her highly enough!

147292.headline: Spanish Teacher Certified with more than 15 Years of experience
147292.shortBio:
Hello !!!
Don't you know where to start learning? Do you have an exam or test soon? Are you going to move to a new city? Does your job require you to speak Spanish? Or do you just want to learn or talk for fun?   
Do not worry anymore. Learn and Speak Spanish with confidence!  Whatever is the reason, I am here to help you.

seoReview.author: Alexandre
seoReview.content: Best teacher ever ! Hope to see you again Michelle.

tutorTags.description: I am talking with two students that love read, so we usually try to focus in the topic, the way how the author is writing and why he is writing in that way. it can be universal literature or mexican literature.
I also having helping some doctors to speak accurately the medical terms.
The students that are in interested about this Spanish is because they has been visited Mexico or they use to work here. They are always interest in the culture.
Some of my students just want to talk about their life or tv series, or songs
I started with the basic and common expression to communicate with others. I have used this method with 20 of my students.
I have been speaking with a least 30 students about topics they want to talk. I usually left them to choose the topic they want to discuss.
I have been preparing to some of my students to be certified in their level of Spanish. What i do is setting exercises like the one you going to do in your test in order you gain more confident.
I have thought Spanish to kids in beginner level and intermediate level. This is much playing games with them in order they can learn, is always fun.
I am teaching people to also make maths, fill invoices, answer the telephone, and prepare them for interviews

2608384.shortBio: Ciao, mi chiamo Alessandra e vengo dal Perù. Sono di madrelingua spagnola e parlo correntemente lo spagnolo neutro, senza accenti o riempitivi; Inoltre, ho un livello di inglese intermedio-conversazionale. La grammatica e l'ortografia spagnola sono la mia specialità, dal momento che mi dedico a scrivere relazioni, saggi e monografie, quindi ho conoscenza dello spagnolo in contesti formali.

ENGLISH
Hi there!
I'm a certified Spanish language instructor with more than 8 years of experience and a standard Spanish accent. I graduated in Foreign Languages at the Sorbonne University in France and I got a Master's degree in language teaching. I have taught in Argentina, France, Slovenia, Russia, China and currently Thailand.

seoReview.content: Poor audio and video. Could not share screen. Something wrong with the platfom

tutorTags.description: I have held SIELE classes in Slovenia and Russia at designated centers.
I have taught SAT Spanish to students in Thai international schools.
I currently help private students prepare for the Cambridge IGCSE and I gave one to one tutoring of Spanish to French students in Paris.
I have taught Spanish for the hotel and tourism industry in several hotel chains in Paris, France.
I am able to speak with the Spanish accent if required and I always incorporate this accent in my readings even if it is not mine.
Being from Argentina, I can speak the Latin American variety of Spanish, even though I am also able to imitate the Spanish accent from Spain (like the one you hear in text books)
I can teach all the skills: listening, speaking, reading and writing with different text books, fun and relevant materials, according to every student's interest, to support my classes.
I taught a two months intensive Spanish course in Ljubljana, Slovenia for college students.
I have taught beginners in France, Slovenia, Russia and currently I have beginners students in Thailand.
I have experience being in charge in Spanish conversational classes in Saint Petersburg, Russia.
I have trained Russian students to sit for the DELE exam.
I have materials for teaching ELE to young learners through songs, games and fun activities.
I have plenty of material for Business Spanish

I work in sales and I'm a student.
I like history, and classical and politics.

seoReview.author: Aeldir

tutorTags.description: Al cursar en el pasado la carrera de Derecho, y ahora cursar las carrera de Historia y de Relaciones internacionales, he alcanzado un nivel de expresión que corresponde al ámbito académico, o universitario.  Lo que permite conseguir un resultado en ambientes profesionales.
Nací en Venezuela.  Viví 2 años en Perú.  Ahora vivo en Uruguay. Conozco diferentes contextos sociales, políticos y culturales que enriquecen el idioma.
El castellano es universal.  Es mi lengua nativa.
Se empieza por lo fundamental: el alfabeto y la pronunciación, para luego interactuar hasta alcanzar una base con la avanzar en el aprendizaje del Español.
Al tener español nativo puedo ofrecer al estudiante una conversación fluida que permita elevar su aprendizaje.

1123060.shortBio: I have a degree in Teaching English as a Foreign Language, so I know the basics of language teaching and learning. Most of my teaching experience has been teaching online, so I am familiar with the tools that will make our class interactive and engaging.

seoReview.author: Shala
seoReview.content: Ada has been very patient and thoughtful with this slow learner ;-) and I really appreciate it. I look forward to our lessons every week!

tutorTags.description: I was born and raised in Colombia.

Al ser nativa de Colombia, puedo ayudarte a prepararte para tu viaje por Latinoamerica con un plan estructurado que incluye información útil para viajar así como información de la cultura de los diferentes paises de Latinoameroca.

Mis lecciones de español general son  estructuradas con base en diapositivas y notas con las correcciones y vocabulario. Ideal para  estudiante que además de la practica oral libre quieren actividades gramaticales relacionadas con el tema de conversación. Esta lección también incluye actividades o tareas (usualmente ver videos o estudiar flash cards de vocabulario) antes de la siguiente lección, pero el alumno puede decidir si quiere estas actividades o no.

Uso los materiales de preply, tanto los de conversación como lo del gramática para que llevemos una conversación que no es aleatoria, sino que buscar mejorar tu vocabulario en diferentes situaciones y contextos.
If you're  looking for random conversation, with me you are in the wrong place.

Hello! My name is Aina, I am from Spain and I love to teach spanish! 
Conversations, essays, mnemonic devices for grammar, movies, music, books… you name it! 
I can help you learn spanish while enjoying the ride! 
Our conversations will be based on culture, art, trending topics, sports, music, medicine, history and more!

seoReview.content: Aina is an easy-going, talented and emphatic teacher. She is interesting to talk to and knows her trade on a highlevel. Lessons are productive and entertaining. Highly recommended teacher.

I can help you improve your spanish!
Spanish is my jam. I will teach you amazing mnemonic devices for you to remember the basic grammar. From there, we will build all the way up!
Conversational Spanish is a great way to learn if we make sure that both of us are understanding. I can't to have a great dynamic and interesting conversation with you!
Games, music, movies and even jokes can make learning so much fun and easy!

My name is Lisset Pineda, I live in Salamanca. I am passionate about my language and enjoy teaching it. I am responsible and competent because I have experience teaching Spanish.
I am interested in the needs of my students, I like to motivate them and make them feel that my classes are an immersion in Spanish.

seoReview.author: Harriet
seoReview.content: Studying with Lisset was great, I can only recommend her! Not only is she well prepared for every lesson and a very nice person to talk to, but she is also checking in with you and your personal needs to take your Spanish to your next level. She really helped me prepare for DELE B2, especially the writing and the speaking parts which I had wanted to lay a focus on. I can see the progress that we've already achieved over the past few weeks and I am very happy about. Definitely 5 stars!

1712047.headline: Previous experience as a Spanish and Catalan teacher.
1712047.shortBio:
Hi, how are you?
My name is Marina, I am 28 years old and I come from Barcelona.
I lived in Austria for a while. In the city where I teach Spanish and also study German.
In many cases, language learning can be boring and boring.
For this reason, I invite you to learn my language in a fun, dynamic and fun way.

seoReview.author: Julie
seoReview.content: Marina is a great teacher, she knows how to make her students feel more confident about their language skills to speak. She is very nice and concerned by teaching. I highly recommend her !

tutorTags.description:
Mis alumnos en la primera clase especifican que quieren aprender y para que. 
Eso a mi me ayuda a desarrollar clases adaptadas según la necesidad del alumno. 
Ya sea para negocios o para la relación con los demás en el trabajo.

Es bueno tener un conocimiento general de un idioma para la supervivencia. 
Para cubrir necesidades básicas . El alumno también puede elegir hasta donde quiere llegar.
Y si luego quiere adentrarse más en el idioma, también puedo ayudarle.

No hay nada mejor que aprender una lengua nueva dedicándole tiempo todos los días. 
Hay que ser constante para lograr objetivos.
He tenido y tengo alumnos de todos los niveles. Mis clases están adaptadas a cada alumno para que no tengan ningún problema a la hora de aprender desde cero.

Me considero una persona muy social, que le gusta tener con sus alumnos buenos ratos de conversación.
Podemos compartir ideas sobre la cultura, historia, arte, viajes..
He ayudado anteriormente a otras personas con dificultades para aprender otras lenguas, a base de tener conversaciones. No hay mejor manera de aprender un idioma que hablando.

225797.headline: Native Spanish Tutor 🇵🇪
225797.shortBio: HELLO! My name is Mariella and I am from Peru 🇵🇪  but I live in Germany 🇩🇪. By profession, I have a bachelor's degree in Tourism and Hotels Management and at the same time I have been Spanish Tutor for some years. Like you, I am very curious about languages, so nowadays I am learning two: English and German.

seoReview.author: Meagan
seoReview.content: She is a great tutor and she was very easy to get along with. I will not be having more lessons with her because our connection was extremely poor likely because of our distance apart, but she herself was amazing and informative. I would highly recommend her.

tutorTags.description: I LOVE WORKING WITH CHILDREN! I have many activities for them: Books, online games, images for coloring, etc. Everything will depend in what the child needs and what the child enjoys to do.
I have experience teaching Spanish as a course and I can provide you all materials that you need to learn in a correct way.

In addition to the previous things I can teach you, I promise that you can learn more about Latinoamerican culture and vocabulary that in most of countries in South America we use. I am really familiar with the Spanish that is talked in Peru, Mexico, Colombia and Venezuela. All my life I have had contact with people from these countries and I know what colloquial words they use and in what contexts.

Spanish is my native language so you will learn how to interact in many situations of life using the appropriate phrases, vocabulary and grammar in those context. Also, I LOVE sharing how is culture in LATIN AMERICA and we can learn together the most common phrases.
You will learn Spanish in an intensive way focusing in VOCABULARY, GRAMMAR, LISTENING AND PRONUNCIATION.

If you are a beginner, we will focus on: Vocabulary, grammar, listening, pronunciation and speaking with different ways to learn like: online exercises, videos, listening and talking face to face with me.

You will learn: Using formal and informal ways to talk with people in any situation, using the new vocabulary in sentences of daily life and how to use proper Spanish intonation in words or phrases. If you want to visit any country that the principal language is Spanish, you will learn what is necessary to be able to communicate properly.

Like you, I am very curious about languages, so nowadays I am learning two: English and German.

1477733.shortBio:
Hello! My name is Adelaida and I'm from Panama. I'm Interior Designer, Architect and Digital Illustrator.
I'm very proud of my Latin roots and I'm a fan of my mother tongue. I'm sure that by practicing Spanish together we will have a great time and you will become more fluent in Spanish. Nice to meet you!

seoReview.author: Sue
seoReview.content: Adelaida is such a great tutor, she would slow down for you and give you time to express yourself. Plus, she arranges her lessons according to your preference and involves many opportunities for you to practice speaking!

tutorTags.description: If you have any doubts about a school or university assignment about the Spanish language, I can help you to understand them and do them correctly.
As a native Latin American, I will be able to help you communicate in Spanish with a fairly neutral accent, as well as learn phrases commonly used by Latin Americans.

Together with me you will be able to improve your fluency in Spanish through conversations about your favorite topics, as well as sharpen your listening skills through movies and audio comprehension in Spanish.
I can help you improve your grammar through dynamic practices so that you can communicate correctly and acquire a professional level of Spanish.

1798876.shortBio:
My name is Adán. I am committed, self-taught and full of curiosity. I am passionate about teaching and languages, as well as creative writing (in my spare time I love reading and writing). 
On a personal level, I stand out for my communication skills, both oral and written, as well as for being creative and proactive.

tutorTags.description: Como filólogo hispánico y como apasionado de la literatura, me apasiona la enseñanza de la Literatura Española e Hispanoamericana y siempre incluyo la literatura incluso en mis clases normales.

Como filólogo hispánico, he trabajado con estudiantes que han necesitado mejorar sus conocimientos del Español como materia en centros educativos nativos (comentarios de texto, morfología, sintaxis, etc.) y extranjeros.
Al ser español, conozco el Español Europeo de forma nativa y lo hablo todos los días. Además, como filólogo hispánico, lo he estudiado en profundidad.

Al trabajar con estudiantes principiantes, según han ido avanzando en su nivel, hemos ido trabajando el Español general que se utiliza en las conversaciones del día a día y en los medios de comunicación.
Al trabajar en un instituto irlandés y dar lecciones privadas, he estado enseñando Español para principiantes, contruyendo unas bases sólidas en la lengua para poder mejorar.
He preparado a los estudiantes para sus exámenes orales de Español de acceso a la universidad, ayudándoles a mejorar su pronunciación y a usar palabras y expresiones como las de un nativo.
Con mi máster de ELE y mi experiencia en un instituto extranjero, he estado enseñando a estudiantes no nativos el español y ayudándoles a prepararse para sus exámenes.

700230.headline: I travel and I give Spanish lessons - Perfect for backpackers!
700230.shortBio:
Hello! Do you want to travel to a Spanish-speaking country but are you afraid of not knowing how to speak the language? I assure you, it is not as difficult as it sounds.
My passion in the world is traveling, learning languages and meeting new people.

seoReview.author: Romina
seoReview.content: She is the best tutor. She is well prepared for each lesson and very patient. She is also very supportive and helps you understand not only the language but also the culture of Spain. I always look forward to our next lesson. She gives you extra knowledge about Spanish life and makes the lessons a wonderful experience. The exercises are very useful and the lessons are adapted to my needs. I would totally recommend her to anyone who wants to learn Spanish and enjoy the lessons. Thank you Tina :)

tutorTags.description: Tuve la posibilidad de enseñar a varios niños en Dinamarca, todo a partir de juegos, canciones y películas
Soy argentina-catalana. Mi vocabulario nativo es el español latino y el europeo. Puedo adaptarme y enseñar Español Europeo o Latinoamericano sin ningún problema
Soy argentina-catalana. Mi vocabulario nativo es el español latino y el europeo. Puedo adaptarme y enseñar Español Europeo o Latinoamericano sin ningún problema
Intento que mis clases sean llevaderas y divertidas, principalmente para los estudiantes principiantes, y que aprendan desde la primer clase.

¡El Español conversacional, para viajeros especialmente, es lo que más disfruto de enseñar! Mi objetivo es que aprendas a tener una conversación fluida en cualquier ambiente, un hospital, hotel, aeropuerto, tienda, supermercado, restaurante, cómo pedir direcciones en la ciudad, ¡y cualquier situación que se pueda presentar!

tutorTags.description: Spanish, like any language, has idioms depending on its origin, Latin American Spanish can be very complex or easy to handle depending on the way it is taught, you can learn a neutral Spanish that will serve you in any Spanish-speaking country.
We will work with all the rules of Spanish for a more conceptual and concrete management
If you already have mastery of the language, we can advance more firmly in that you drive and you can have a more fluid dixion and reading
You do not need to have knowledge of the language, we start from scratch in a comfortable and pleasant way, learning from the base of Spanish

237382.headline: Native Spanish teacher, Instituto Cervantes certified
237382.shortBio:
Hello! I'm from Chile and I'm currently living in Berlin since 2017.
I am an engineer by profession and also a certified Spanish teacher. I have more than 4 years of experience working as a Spanish teacher in Chile, Argentina, Berlin, Denmark and teaching online to students from all over the world.

tutorTags.description: I am Chilean and I know very well the different expressions of my country.
Literature is my passion, for years I read and write constantly. It is a topic that I master and enjoy.
As a language lover, I know the culture and tradition of Spanish
Depending on the profession, I can adapt the classes for specific vocabularies.
I have lived and traveled in many countries of Latin America, I know the different variants of Spanish.
I have lived in Spain and Latin America, as well as Denmark and Germany. I have known and practiced general Spanish.
We can focus on and learn a certain topic of Spanish in a short time.
As a certified teacher of the Instituto Cervantes, I know how to teach Spanish from level A1 to level C1.
For many years in Berlin I had students who were looking to maintain their level of Spanish in conversation.
I studied economics at university, business Spanish is my specialty.

1448396.shortBio:
"You will love tapas, stews and wine, but eating it with me will allow you to make your own recipes"
Dear adventurer,
Welcome to my profile!
I am Spanish and Catalan, with experience in teaching and learning a new language, I am here to help you, to teach you and to have fun in the process.

seoReview.author: Lewis
seoReview.content:
Tutor, coach, friend, Jaume is the best Spanish tutor I have ever had. He is attentive, patient and incredibly interesting to talk to. He will understand your level and explain things in a clear and understandable way. Most importantly, he respects the fact that I only want to speak Spanish in our lessons and he is always on time and punctual. At the end of each lesson, I have a list of vocab we have learned so I can practice in my own time. He also highlights my mistakes during the lesson. Book a trial and take your Spanish to the next level with a top guy.

(Tutor, entrenador, amigo, Jaume es el mejor profesor de español que he tenido. Es atento, paciente e increíblemente interesante para hablar. Entiende tu nivel y te explica las cosas de forma clara y comprensible. Lo más importante es que respeta el hecho de que sólo quiero hablar español en nuestras lecciones y siempre es puntual y puntual. Al final de cada lección, tengo una lista del vocabulario que hemos aprendido para poder practicar en mi tiempo libre. También resalta mis errores durante la lección. Reserva una prueba y lleva tu español al siguiente nivel con un chico de primera.)

tutorTags.description: To develop the base, the first steps or the fundaments of your new path as a learner of spanish language, you must be guided by someone that can dominate the language and its content to facilitate the learning, pleausure and the entertainment. One of my best interest with begginers, is to give them amazing trick of how to learn and improve fast, efficient and useful.

Creating and learning about the development of the sentences, is the first step right after learn some new vocabulary. Ready to ensure a good pronouncing and sentence composition during conversations with spanish speakers. More than 2 year teching online to different ages and personalities.
I love to share a good conversation with my students, it empowers both.

The children often have a big facility to a new language. Must ensure a great time with them, confidence and personalize activities with their likes, school or outlive event and tasks. I want to learn by playing and laughting, that's why always i choosed kids, children and youngage, they seems to be more excited to learn with that atmosphere.

All about bussines voacabulary, sentences, expressions, and content is familiar to me. Been working on several bussines and meeting talks in my work experience. If my students don't have knowledge it's always multiple ways to modul and prepare them for their future bussines deals.
As a native Spanish, i can provide plenty of information about spanish idea, likes, aspects of how to use the language, traditions, culture, costums...

694149.headline: Certified teacher with 4 years of experience.
694149.shortBio:
Hello; Redemption!
My name is Esther, I come from Spain and live in Salamanca.
I
have been working as a Spanish teacher for 4 years. I have experience with children, adolescents and adults. My goal is to adapt to your needs and create fun and personalized activities.

seoReview.author: Claudia
seoReview.content:
Esther is one of the best teachers I ever had.
She is very professional and experienced.
She is always well prepared, her explanations are easy to understand and supported by good examples.
Esther's clases are well structured. She uses a wide range of learning material that is very helpful.
Esther is very patient and super nice person.
I highly recommend Esther's clases!

tutorTags.description: I have been teaching children of all ages and abilities for years now. I can deliver learning in a friendly and approachable manner.

I am an examiner of DELE (Diploma de Español como Lengua Extranjera) of A1, A2, B1, B2, C1 and C2. When I prepare my students the key aspects of Spanish in order to pass their exams, it is very useful being an examiner as I know perfectly well the most important ideas they need to know to get a fantastic results.
You will receive a lot of support for your assignments from uni, college or school. I will be here to correct your mistakes and provide positive feedback!
My Spanish is from Spain and that is the language I use more confortably as it the way I speak everyday.
I will help you build your trust in order to communicate in Spanish, we will work on your strengths but also your weaknesses.
We will work little by little in order to learn the basics of the language until you can have a solid conversation.

I will help you lose your fear to talk in Spanish in order to maintain a fluent conversation. We will talk about what you think is blocking you from speaking in Spanish and we will work on your accent, pronunciation and spontaneity in talking.

seoReview.content: I am an absolute spanish beginner and ana has been my teacher for one month now. She is a great teacher, her lessons are fun, she is very motivated willing to help wherever she can. Thank you Ana.

tutorTags.description: I am Mexican, my Spanish is native and the most natural to learn in the world. I like spelling which I think is very important and at the same time can be a lot of fun when learning
I can teach you to speak Spanish from having a casual conversation, singing a song, watching a movie, to regular grammar classes.

556447.headline: Adaptable and effective Spanish coach. Pronunciation specialist 🗣🏅
556447.shortBio:
I'm Sergio, a certified Native Spanish coach from Mexico with ample experience working with children and adults. 
If you are a beginner, my job is to teach you how to communicate using what you will need in the real world by making it interesting and fun for you.

seoReview.author: Pelle
seoReview.content: Sergio is one of the best tutors I had. He is fun, friendly and seriously helping me progress faster. I am looking forward to my next class with him.

tutorTags.description: Common English expressions are among my favorite things to teach. Knowing these will help you with everyday conversations, and help you to sound like a native English speaker.

I have ample experience working with different foreign companies. Therefore, I can teach you how to communicate effectively in the workplace with your coworkers and team, how to answer and write e-mails, and even how to speak with your employer formally.
I can teach you how to explain yourself in a simple purchase-sale transaction, as well as how to close a contract or legal agreement.
So you need to travel to México? Or perhaps to talk with family or friends? NO hay problema, Mexican Spanish is my specialty.

For this, we could use highly concentrated, one-on-one instruction and a curriculum targeted especially to your individual needs. We can work 5 days a week, 2 hours daily to make it happen! Please, make sure to check my availability first.

I'll teach you useful shortcuts to make speaking Spanish easy for you so that you can start as soon as possible! We'll study the differences between the two Spanish verbs for "to be" (SER and ESTAR), verbs in the present tense, present perfect, and near future. Also, we'll have practical exercises for pronunciation and vocabulary in everyday situations.
These are essentials that you will need for sure! I'll teach you phrases you will use in the real world with fun, dynamic and interactive lessons.

My Spanish classes for kids are designed to make learning fun and interactive. I'll introduce the language through engaging interactive lessons that will get your child using the language immediately to build confidence and gain fluency.

I have many years of experience with American English. From my childhood to this day, I read information, listened to music, studied books, and talked with Americans, and I have extensive knowledge of their culture, expressions, and even their sense of humor!

For years, I have taught beginners of all ages and of different nationalities. Personally, it motivates me to see how someone manages to take their first steps in this dynamic language. Go ahead and try it!
Since 2015, I have taught boys and girls from 5 years of age and onward. I have helped them to learn and improve their English through fun dynamics and games.

tutorTags.description: Si eres un profesional puedo enseñarte palabras y conversaciones de tu campo.
Enseño español estándar, muy útil en entornos europeos e internacionales.
Te enseño Español para el día a día, para las rutinas, para la vida cotidiana y para viajar.
Si quieres aprender español rápido, podemos hacer clases continuas, intensas, de 0 a 100, para mejorar tu escritura o tu habla más natural.
Soy paciente y podemos aprender y repetir poco a poco.
Te hablo de forma correcta para que consigas un español más fluido.
Podemos aprender español de forma paciente y divertida con frases sencillas y conversaciones útiles.
Soy abogado y conozco lo negocios. Te puedo enseñar palabras técnicas y correctas, desarrollar conversaciones sobre temas legales o financieros y hablar español de negocios.

807675.headline: Speak Spanish! Certified tutor with 5 years of experience with French speaking students
807675.shortBio: I'm a native teacher from Argentina, and I have lived in Peru for several years. I have lived in France since 2018 and have experience teaching French students independently and for language schools. I love languages ​​and I am a very curious person. I love doing research on all kinds of topics.

tutorTags.description: Vivo en Europa, aquí se prioriza la enseñanza del español de España. En mis clases enseño uso, gramática, léxico del español según su utilización en la península ibérica.

Clases enfocadas a la presentación de las variantes del español en Latinoamérica, aspectos culturales, turísticos. Presentación de léxico, contrastes entre los usos del español en diferentes países de América del Sur. Soy originaria de Argentina pero he vivido muchos años en Perú, conozco de forma muy cercana y personal las diferencias en los distintos tipos de español que hablamos en Sudamérica y sé cómo emplearlos según el registro y la situación sociocultural.

Lo que llamo español neutro y personalmente me encanta. Clases enfocadas a conocer todos los aspectos importantes del español tanto latinoamericano como ibérico, sus diferencias y la adquisición del español que permite la comunicación, comprensión e interacción con cualquier hispanohablante sea de donde sea.

Clases de conversación con ampliación de vocabulario, frases hechas, temáticas de actualidad, español de uso diario. Como profesora priorizo el aspecto conversacional suministrando las herramientas escritas, visuales y audibles que son la base del bagaje necesario para alcanzar la competencia comunicativa.

seoSnippet.shortBio: I'm a native teacher from Argentina, and I have lived in Peru for several years. I love doing research on all kinds of topics.

197530.shortBio: ¡Hola a todos! Me llamo Silvia. I am a Spanish journalist passionate about teaching. I have 3 years of experience teaching Spanish to peopple of all ages and I am absolutely convinced that learning a language should be fun!! ¿Te animas a aprender español conmigo?

tutorTags.description: Tengo experiencia enseñando español general a extranjeros. Mis clases además de gramática están compuestas de lectura y conversación sobre temas de interés como cultura, gastronomía o deporte, dependiendo de los intereses del alumno.
Adapto mis clases al nivel del alumno y elijo temas para conversar dependiendo de cuáles sean sus intereses.

1640972.headline: Spanish native speaker certified by the European University of Miguel de Cervantes. Private lessons adapted to your tastes and your pace of learning.
1640972.shortBio:
Hello!
I am Laura, Spanish, born in Pamplona (Navarra) and have lived in Madrid for 13 years.
I'm interested in reading, writing, cinema, music, sports, gardening, cooking and LEARNING SPANISH.
My way of learning is fun (you won't get bored), but also effective (you notice constant learning and further development).

tutorTags.description: Estoy acostumbrada a hablar, a escribir y a interactuar con diversas personas en Español, por lo que estas clases de Español General serán divertidas y exigentes. Las primeras clases servirán para conocernos y ver qué inquietudes tienes, de esta manera podremos personalizar mejor tus intereses y tu ritmo de aprendizaje. ¿Te apuntas?

Si quieres una inmersión intensiva, ¡podemos hacerlo! Si lo que quieres es un curso español en poco tiempo para ver tus progresos y aprendizajes constantes, ¡bienvenido/a! Te espero con ganas y motivación para enseñarte todo lo que he aprendido desde que nací.

Aprender Español es apasionante, y los inicios de un idioma son los más bonitos en mi opinión. Por ello, el Español para principiantes me encanta, es un momento de reto entre alumno/a - profesor/a donde aprender las primeras palabras, expresiones, gramática, vocabulario...

Soy nacida en España por lo que las conversaciones conmigo son en Español nativo, algo que ayudará a que aprendas este idioma con acento totalmente español. Tendremos unas conversaciones divertidas y efectivas, acorde a tus gustos y a tu ritmo de aprendizaje.

835497.headline: Native Spanish tutor for MD's. Custom classes
835497.shortBio:
Hello! My name is Pedro,
I am a Spanish tutor for doctors, dentists, medical students, and other health science workers.
I live in Venezuela and study Medicine.
I am a native Spanish speaker and have an advanced level of English, I am going to teach you how to express and understand Spanish perfectly, as well as its grammar.

seoReview.author: Mariia
seoReview.content: I would definitely recommend Pedro as a Spanish teacher. His lessons are not boring, the material are interesting and combine gramma and vocabulary, which is very important to learn both. The way he teach is helping to remember the material and move on to learn new.

tutorTags.description: If you have Spanish as a subject at your school or university, I can help you achieve the skills and contents of your study plan. Also, I will help you with your homework and help you to be prepare for the exams.

Health Sciences: Tailored lessons according to your field of study. We can study biology, anatomy, physiology, among others. We can also practice cases, interviews, and interactions with your patients
Each Latin country has characteristic expressions. We will learn regionalisms and a little more about the culture of each country.
I am able to give any student the keys to an effective communication, while I guide them through a conversation.
I will teach you the basics to build correct sentences in Spanish with a  combination of key grammar topics, custom vocabulary lists, and conversation drills, all in 10 classes.
I´ll help you with your first steps in Spanish. We will learn useful phrases and vocabulary adapted to your needs and preferences.
Improve your Spanish through conversations of your interest. You will learn new words and practice what you already know; you will improve your grammar without realizing it.
I have designed this program to help our little fellows to start their journey with Spanish language, In no time they will be at the top of bilingualism.

676463.headline: Passionate tutor with +5 years of experience
676463.shortBio: I believe there is no one right way to learn a language. My own learning process of 5 different languages (Spanish, Catalan, English, French, and Dutch) has proved to me so. Personally, I think that building up your confidence and finding your way to accumulate vocabulary and improve your grammar is the best way to get to know a language and eventually master it.

seoReview.author: Kate
seoReview.content: Marta is great tutor very enthusiastic , passionate about teaching always very well prepared for lessons.

tutorTags.description: I am always happy to share my area of expertise with students. I have a bachelor on Literary Studies and greatly enjoy analizing and getting deeper into a great piece of literature. From García Márquez to Cortázar to Vargas Llosa, through Bolaño, Asensi or Marías, there's a lot to discover in the great spanish novelists. Similarly, we can also get into the breathtaking poetry of Storni, Lorca, Machado, Panero, Gimferrer and Pato. From a selected list of literary works we will contextualise and analyse passages, characters, spaces, tone, rhythm and much more, while practicing the spanish language.

I have taught lessons to students who saw profitable to study Spanish for their career, or for which it was even a requisit. In this case, it is good to know what is the most profitable vocabulary and expressions the student must learn and work infatigaly on them to grow his or her command at work scenerios. Play role is often a great exercise, as well as listening and pronunciation, to be able to keep the calls clear and specific. Similarly, writing routines will be handy to easily process and put in use the knowledge acquired, in a short time period if necessary, and in the longer run.

The intensive Spanish lessons are directed to those who feel ready to be demanding on themselves. That means a lot of memorizing, but as this is not always easy, I have prepared lots of exercises and tests that can regularly help you see your progress. I think the more you comprehend what is it that you already know and what are the gaps that should be worked on, it becomes a way more steady road to walk. In that case, listening, vocabulary, grammar and writing all come together to reinforce your learning.

It is always a pleasure to accompany the student through the firsts steps learning a language. I like to work on pronunciation, so that even the small knowledge you have is solid and good. Another important aspect is to start to understand how the grammar works, so that it is easy to build up on it afterwards.

I had a great experience meeting up with students who wanted to be fluent in their speaking. I simply prepared some topics, kept a notebook to note down those great expressions that the student was learning to use and also to keep track of remarks in grammar or vocabulary for his or her future.
I like to keep the conversational meetings relaxed, focused on the student growth and as efficient as possible.

seoSnippet.shortBio: I believe there is no one right way to learn a language. My own learning process of 5 different languages (Spanish, Catalan, English, French, and Dutch) has proved to me so. Personally, I think that building up your confidence and finding your way to accumulate vocabulary and improve your grammar is the best way to get to know a language and eventually master it.

I will go wherever the wind takes me I just wanna keep on traveling.

tutorTags.description: Estudiamos diferentes jergas y palabras con diferentes significados alrededor de diferentes paises de latinoamerica.
Enseño de manera lenta, divertida y facil. En principiantes tenemos ejercicios basicos de conversacion, lectura, compresion de lectura, escucha y esccritura.

La mayoria de mis estudiantes disfrutan muchisimo la conversacion. Es algo que se debe de practicar muchisimo y siempre hablamos de temas que les interese a ellos. Poco a poco toman mas confianza y hablar de manera mas fluida.
Proporciono preparacion para los examenes del Instituto Cervantes de DELE. Experiencia en todos los niveles.

1434673.shortBio:

I like meeting people around the world and sharing the perspective of how we see the world I believe the more we share with others the more we learn.

seoReview.author: Brandon
seoReview.content: I came to Luis for help learning Spanish as a Paramedic. While teaching me standard conversational Spanish, he always makes a point to add in things and lessons specific to my job. After a few weeks, I already feel more comfortable with spanish speaking patients am confident that I will be able to successfully communicate within a few more months. Thank you Luis for your patience and professionalism.

tutorTags.description: Podemos conversar sobre cualquier tema que te llame la atención :D.

Soy de Venezuela y si te interesa los modismos que se usan acá o en los paises cerca de Venezuela puedo ayudarte.
Trabaje varios años en una agencia naviera y otros ambiente donde se requiere un excelente actitud profesional, puedo ayudarte en lo que precises saber.

418995.headline: Mexican born with clear accent.  4 years experience. CONVERSATIONAL & PERSONALIZED lessons- gain confidence & fluency!
418995.shortBio:
Hi, My name is Diana. I'm originally from Mexico but I have been residing in Canada since 2006. I have experienced first hand the challenges of moving to a different country & learning a new language. 
You worry about your limited vocabulary, you wonder about your accent, etc.

seoReview.author: Samer
seoReview.content: Diana has been so pleasant, enthusiastic, professional and very patient with me! I already feel that my Spanish is getting better and I am enjoying each class and even the homeworks! She has built a strategy that fits me very well and i look forward to continue working with her. I would recommend Diana to anyone trying to learn or develop their Spanish!

tutorTags.description: Students of various ages starting to learn Spanish at school or using online platforms to start learning Spanish.

Native speaker. 
Born and raised in Mexico.
Residing in Canada since 2006 ( Bilingual)

Intensive lessons are great for students that are knowledgeable about the Spanish language and want to skyrocket their progress in a shorter period of time. I plan lessons that are highly specific/ tailored to a particular goal.  For example: if the student wants to effectively communicate in order to find employment in a Spanish speaking country. We will focus on resume building, interview prep, business vocabulary, etc.
If you have multiple goals in mind, please let me know. I will develop a curriculum that incorporates all of your goals and organize highly effective lesson plans that make sense. We will use many different materials to improve your Spanish fluency, expand your vocabulary and improve your writing, as well as Spanish comprehension. 
During the trial lesson, the student can request lessons that are 100% in Spanish (no English assistance) in order to truly immerse himself/herself in the Spanish world.

I hold a BBA in Human Resources. I've been in the corporate world for over 5 years, so I can help you with:
Interview preparation
Public speaking 
Advanced University Level Spanish
Effective Business Communication
Business Vocabulary
I was born and raised in Mexico.

Planning an exciting holiday to a Spanish speaking country or moving to a different country? 
I'll help you with slang, " everyday" Spanish vocabulary, idioms and jokes.
You'll learn to communicate & socialize with locals effectively!

I hold a Business Administration Degree in Human Resources. I've over 5 years of work experience in this field. Besides that, I have and entrepreneurship spirit that has allowed me to work in various settings in Mexico & Canada. 
 I help my students get ready for the workplace with:
- Highly Specialized Business Lessons to expand vocabulary and fluency.
- Interview prep.
- Resume building.

2853494.shortBio:
Hello, my name is Ade and I am a native Spanish speaker 
I love traveling, reading, practicing sports, specially jogging, and meeting new people.
I have been working as specialist in the Global Mobility area during 6 years and as private teacher during 7 years, I have taught modern standard Arabic and this year 2022 I started teaching Spanish (ELE).

tutorTags.description: I can help you learn Spanish if you have an academic purpose. I am a language specialist; I have studied Spanish language, Linguistics, History of the literature, and other  language based subjects.

I have experience teaching for professional purposes and, additionally I have also professional experience because I have been working in different sectors: Global Mobility (+6 years), sales   (+6 months), teaching (+7 years). This could be very helpful to help students identify their goals and requirements.

I have been teaching as private teacher during the last 7 years. I am a specialized in Arabic's and I have recently started teaching Spanish. Thanks' to my know how experience in teaching and linguistic studies, I can teach based on a solid methodical bases.

I will be happy to help you in your beginnings with Spanish; many students tell me that I am very patient
I am fluent in English, French and Arabic so it will be very helpful to communicate with the student before he/she will be ready to talk.

I have taught Spanish courses for adult foreigners in NGOs as a volunteer, during the internship as part of the course for Spanish teaching program certificate, as a partner of language exchange programs. We talked about different topics but mostly those of day- to- day life.

I have been working in two multinational companies as specialist in Global Mobility I have been involved in the day-to-day dynamics and objectives. It could be very helpful for vocabulary, expressions, Spanish business culture and email drafting.

159101.headline: Certified Spanish teacher with 8 years of teaching experience
159101.shortBio: Hi! My name is Alberto and I am a fully qualified teacher of Spanish as a foreign language. I currently live in Madrid, Spain. I offer personalised lessons for students of all levels, from beginners A1 to advanced C2 (General Spanish, Business Spanish, Exam Preparation DELE/SIELE/GCSE/A-Level, conversation, grammar, culture. . . )

seoReview.author: Matthew
seoReview.content: Alberto has been a brilliant tutor, he has given me well structured lessons, he tunes in well to my needs, and has been adpating his classes to my particular strengths and weaknesses (I have a basic to intermediate level in Spanish). For me this is a sure sign of an experienced teacher, and is just what I need.

tutorTags.description: I have a lot of experience with General Spanish courses, both in Spain and the UK with ages ranging from 12 to 65+. We will work on a good balance between conversation, grammar, vocabulary and overall comprehension. All the lessons will have set objectives, contents and appropiate materials so that you can review and consolidate after and before the lessons.

I have worked with hundreds of students who started learning Spanish from zero. We can tailor a plan together by deciding which method would work best for you. Classes will be fun, engaging and instructive with plenty of materials to make the most out of your new learning experience.
I have experience with SIELE students as the university where I studied is one of the creators of the exam. I can provide you with tips, guidelines and preparation for it.
Apart from Business Spanish, I can help you with any type of Spanish for Specific Purposes (health, tourism..) Ask for information if you are interested in a particular field.

I offer  Business Spanish courses from B1 (intermediate) to C1 (Advanced). Lessons will be tailored and will address aspects of your professional interest so that you make the most of it from your lessons.

I have a lot of experience with conversational private lessons, in person and online. Together we will find the best way to get you talking among a variety of methods I use. I provide materials and advice so that you feel at ease with your speaking.
Every week I work with groups of 6-8 students from diverse countries in intensive Spanish courses (20h per week) from A1 to C1.
I speak Castilian Spanish (Spanish from Spain)
Qualified DELE examiner by Instituto Cervantes. I have succesfully prepared students for their exams from A2 to C1 with a 100% pass rate.

seoReview.author: Annette
seoReview.content: Very engaged and patient teacher, even with the knowledge to teach teenager pupils. I only can recommend Juan and hope for a long cooperation.

tutorTags.description: Puedo preparar alumnos para estos examenes.

Soy un apasionado de la literatura española, en particular  de la latinoamericana, por lo que con mis alumnos mas avanzados discutimos textos en español y les hago recomendaciones de libros acordes a su nivel.
Enseño español como materia de apoyo escolar y académico.

Trabajo con alumnos que desean preparar entrevistas, conferencias o presentaciones en español con fines profesionales. En este caso, nos enfocamos en la redacción de los textos, pronunciación y expresión oral.

Actualmente vivo en España y en mis clases utilizo un acento neutro para que mis alumnos puedan observar las diferencias en cuanto a pronunciación, expresión y vocabulario entre el español latinoamericano y el de España.
Nací y crecí en Argentina, pero he viajado por Sudamérica varias veces, por lo que puedo compartir con ustedes diferentes acentos y expresiones latinoamericanas.
Con los alumnos mas avanzados, hacemos conversación de temas de interés y cultura general. De esta forma, adquieren mayor vocabulario, formas gramaticales complejas y expresiones idiomáticas nuevas.
Para aquellos alumnos que necesiten aprender español con urgencia, me enfoco en sus necesidades inmediatas (viaje de negocios, turismo, exámenes, etc.).
La mayoría de mis alumnos comenzaron con un nivel inicial y con practica, dedicación y enfocándonos en el desarrollo de la comunicación durante las clases, han ido avanzando de muy buena manera.
Mis clases son enfocadas principalmente en conversación en Español, por lo que aliento a mis estudiantes a perder el miedo de expresarse en este idioma, facilitándoles herramientas de comunicación.
Preparo alumnos para presentaciones de negocios y entrevistas laborales.

2401991.headline: Native Spanish speaker, more than 6 year of experience.
2401991.shortBio: Hello, my name is Yanet, I´m form Cuba and I love teaching. I have a degree in Music, piano profile, and I have a Master's Degree in Management of Musical Historical Heritage, which has allowed me to have several articles published and support the writing of the Center for Research and Development of Cuban Music, CIDMUC.

tutorTags.description: I am from Cuba, the slang and the way of speaking of this beautiful and partying town is another of the topics that we can deal with. If you are interested in traveling to Cuba, you should not miss these classes on typical phrases and Cuban-style communication.

The SIELE Spanish certificate is an online exam that is taken at Authorized Examination Centers. There are more than 85 countries and more than 800 centers where candidates can certify their Spanish. They can be examined in the place and at the time they choose since there are no previous calls.
We will prepare the 4 tests for the exam, at the level you choose, ensuring a successful final result. We will work on your weak points and what you need to improve and focus on so as not to fail.

If you love Spanish, the literature of this exquisite language is something you should know, we will work on your understanding and writing, focused on what you want to achieve. We will work with poetry, classic texts, journalism, and even essential books to truly appreciate the beauty of our literature.

If you are studying Spanish at school and want to stand out in your class, you should not miss these classes. I will put all my experience at the service of your faculties and we will work on your weak points and doubts, whether they are grammatical, comprehension, communication, or at the time of writing.

If what you need is general knowledge, not very deep in a specific topic, we can address various types of conversations, and study grammatical tenses. Achieve that you can communicate and understand Spanish speakers naturally.

An intensive course in which you will learn grammar, communication, oral comprehension, and writing. All focused on the specific topic of your preference. Depending on your level of knowledge of the language at the time of beginning the study, I assure you that you will have much more fluency and knowledge at the end of it, thus raising a complete level within the learning process.

We will start from scratch, at your pace, and without pressure. From the beginning focused on pronunciation and comprehension. You will see the new language with familiarity, you will be able to reach the level you want to reach.
Focused on conversations, so that you can understand and be able to communicate with your ideas on specific topics.

The DELE (Diploma Español Como Lengua Extranjera) certificate is the officially recognized qualification for proficiency and fluency in Spanish. It is issued and recognized by the Ministry of Education, Culture, and Sport of Spain.
The diplomas are divided into three levels to suit different levels of Spanish attainment. You can take any level you wish, and there are no requirements to hold a lower level before taking a higher one. The levels available are: Diploma de Español (Nivel Inicial) Mid-Intermediate level; Diploma de Español (Nivel Intermedio) High-intermediate level; and Diploma de Español (Nivel Superior) Superior level.
I have always prepared more than 30 students for all levels with positive results.
Learning words, phrases, use of multimedia, colors and visual examples is essential to get the student interested in the language. You will see it as a game, pure fun and learning.

tutorTags.description: He realizado formación de profesor de español en Colombia y he vivido allá durante dos años.
¿Quiere aprender literatura española o tener clases de refuerzo de la asignatura de Literatura? Mejore sus conocimientos y resultados conmigo.
Mejore sus resultados en cursos de español en todos los niveles. Clases de seguimiento, refuerzo y todo lo necesario para mejorar su rendimiento.
Soy nativo de España creciendo en el contexto del español europeo.
De 2015 a 2020 he vivido en varios países latinoamericanos, estudiando sus particularidades y riqueza cultural e histórica.
¿Necesitas cumplir con unos objetivos en poco tiempo? Agenda clases intensivas para aprobar cualquier examen o alcanzar metas rápidamente.
Desarrollo clases para principiantes mediante recursos adaptados y actividades divertidas. De esa manera, formar las bases para el aprendizaje del español.

La lengua conversacional es extremadamente importante para entender las situaciones de la vida real, que en muchas ocasiones no son gramaticalmente correctas o funcionan con expresiones difíciles de traducir. En un ciclo de estudio  del español siempre incluyo secciones dedicadas al español conversacional y a su comprensión.
Prepara tu examen DELE conmigo y trabaja todas las competencias necesarias para conseguir cualquier certificación.
Quiere aprender vocabulario y expresiones para especializarse en una profesión? ¿Quiere preparar una reunión o entrevista de trabajo? Me especializo en atender sus necesidades como estudiante.

886875.headline: Currently an English (U.K) student. I love teaching people  and making them feel comfortable with their mistakes. Not here to judge. I'm chill and patient.
886875.shortBio:
It may be hard to speak Spanish. . . but it is much harder to speak CHILEAN Spanish. If you can understand Chilean Spanish you will be able to understand any kind of Spanish. ! (CHILE: Longest country in the world).
In our lessons we will review the different expressions, idioms, and slangs prevalent in my country, but not limited to Chile.

tutorTags.description: Te enseñaré los diferentes modismos, expresiones y jergas que utilizamos en mi país, Chile.
My Spanish has always been scholarized, since my education has never finished. I can definitely provide you with  Spanish for a professional/specific use.
Making you speak is one of my main goals, and I believe communication can hold a good relationship.
Being born in South America has given me the capacity to be in touch with Chilean Spanish.

2868606.headline: Excellent English tutor for practicing and improving spanish skills
2868606.shortBio:
I'm Sebastian. I'm a Colombian lawyer. I like walking, camping and traveling. I love sports. I am sociable and try to learn something every day. Now, I am interested in Real Estate.
I consider myself a good friend, an entrepreneur and a good salesman.

tutorTags.description: Soy abogado y he leido bastante acerca de literatura escrita en español. Conozco muchas obras escritas que narran nuestra cultura hispanica, nuestro pensamiento e historia.

COmo abogado, he tenido que interactuar con personas extranjeras que necesitan enteder nuestro lenguaje y nuestra cultura hispanica. He trabjado traduciendo textos escritos en Estados Unidos y Europa.
He viajado dentro de Colombia y Panama. Conozco muchas de las costumbres nativas, los acentos y algunas palabras típicas de cada región.
He estudiado y estoy informado constantemente de nuevas expresiones y nuevas palabras en español. También, sigo aprendiendo de palabras que no conozco.
Dentro de mi rutina diaria, me comunico constantemente con personas en español porque necesito una buena conversación para hacer negocios y llegar a buenos acuerdos.
Soy abogado especialista en negocios inmobiliarios. Me gustan los negocios y las empresas. Tengo un pequeño negocio y conozco el lenguaje correcto para comunicarse efectivamente.

947677.headline: SPANISH FOR FOREIGNERS ! IS EASY  AND FUN ¡ -  ADULTS - BEGINNERS
947677.shortBio:
Dear student, how are you? Would you love to learn Spanish and have tons of fun at the same time? So . . . Welcome! . My name is Diana Lorena. I am a re bilingual assistant and I study modern languages
During my work experiences, I have been able to meet people from abroad and I have done tourist tours, translations and prepared Spanish classes for them.

seoReview.author: Bruno
seoReview.content: Lorena and I had now two lessons together which were fun and where I learned great Spanish expressions and good pronounciations. 689267.headline: Lic. en Docencia y Lic. en Filosofía/8 años exp.
689267.shortBio: Soy docente; he laborado en distintas áreas de la enseñanza. Por ejemplo, he laborado como docente de filosofía y también como capacitadora en TICs. Actualmente, soy docente universitaria en Costa Rica; doy los cursos de Introducción a la pedagogía, Orientaciones pedagógicas y Ética profesional en educación.

tutorTags.description:
Puedes aprender el idioma español, desde las frases, saludos, preguntas, etc., latinoamericanas. Qué mejor manera de aprender español, que con una nativa de Costa Rica. 
You can learn the Spanish language, from the Latin American phrases, greetings, questions, etc. What better way to learn Spanish than with a native of Costa Rica.

Puedes mejorar tus conocimientos del idioma español al repasar gramática y, obtener herramientas comunicativas, también. 
You can improve your knowledge of the Spanish language by reviewing grammar and obtaining communication tools, too.

Puedes comenzar a aprender el idioma español por medio de vocabulario básico: los números, los colores, los días de la semana, frases básicas, saludos, preguntas básicas, etc. Podremos divertirnos con actividades sencillas y significativas. 
You can begin to learn the Spanish language through basic vocabulary: numbers, colors, days of the week, basic phrases, greetings, basic questions, etc. We can have fun with simple and meaningful activities.

Puedes mejorar tus habilidades comunicativas, por medio de saludos, presentaciones, vocabulario, frases, preguntas, etc. Podremos conversar en español y aprender al mismo tiempo; la idea es que sea muy divertido. 
You can improve your communication skills, through greetings, introductions, vocabulary, phrases, questions, etc. We can converse in Spanish and learn at the same time; the idea is that it be a lot of fun.

He trabajado con niños, anteriormente y sé, que podemos tener unas sesiones muy divertidas y significativas, para que aprendas español de verdad. Se me ocurren muchas ideas para que aprendas español, podemos utilizar Kahoot!, padlet, mentimeter y muchos juegos en línea que nos permiten practicar y aprender. 
I have worked with children before and I know that we can have some very fun and meaningful sessions for you to really learn Spanish. I can think of many ideas for you to learn Spanish, we can use Kahoot !, padlet, mentimeter and many online games that allow us to practice and learn.

2788093.headline: Nous parlerons espagnol de manière dynamique et personnalisée.
2788093.shortBio: Bonjour, je m'appelle Elvira, je suis péruvienne et je vis à l'ile de la Réunion (département français d'outre-mer). J'ai étudié l'agronomie au Pérou et j'ai travaillé de nombreuses années dans ce secteur. Je parle également le français et un peu l'anglais (parce que j'ai vécu en Afrique du Sud pendant six mois).

tutorTags.description: Soy peruana y me encanta viajar, tengo amigos en diferentes países de latinoamérica por lo tanto  conozco el español latinoamericano y puedo ayudarte a aprender vocabulario y expresiones, también compartir contigo sobre esta hermosa cultura y lengua.

Me encantaría ayudarte con las bases del español para que aprendas de manera dinámica y practica, hablando desde el primer momento. He enseñado a alumnos que jamas habían aprendido español antes y he visto su progreso en su expresión oral y su comprensión de la lengua.

Soy hablante nativa de español y puedo ayudarte ha mejorar tus habilidades comunicativas a través de clases dinámicas y practicas de acuerdo a tus necesidades. Aprenderás de una manera natural ya que usaremos recursos para desarrollar tu escucha y tu expresión oral.
