I consider myself a patient and kind person, I also have experience in the field of education for children and adults; that's why I understand that not all people learn the same way.

seoReview.author: Charles
seoReview.content: Valery is an amazing tutor. She is great at pushing you to achieve your learning goals and proper pronunciation. Valery's English is perfect and her ability to help you learn Spanish is amazing.

tutorTags.description: In 10 lessons and with a little effort on your part I will teach you the basics to build correct sentences in Spanish. We will use a combination of key grammar topics, custom vocabulary lists, and conversation drills.

If Spanish is a subject at your school or university, I can help you achieve the skills and contents of your study plan. Also, I will help you with your homework and help you to be prepare for the exams.

I have taught children and teenagers (from 3 to 17 years old) for more than two years. These lessons are 100% customized to the student's level, interest and time. You will learn using different resources (google docs, youtube, screen sharing). My main goal for kids is to teach them how to say whatever they want!

Health Sciences. Tailored lessons according to your field of study. We can study biology, anatomy, physiology or any other subject you want. In addition, we can practice cases, interviews, and interactions with your patients
Although we all speak Spanish, each Latin country has characteristic expressions. We will learn regionalisms and a little more about the culture of each country.

I´ll be glad to help you with your first steps in Spanish. Little by little, we will learn grammar from useful phrases and vocabulary adapted to your needs. The lesson will be completely personalized to your goals and preferences.

I am able to guide any student through a conversation and give them the keys to an effective communication.
---
Soy capaz de guiar a cualquier estudiante a través de una conversación y de proporcionarle las claves para una comunicación efectiva.

Improve your Spanish through conversations of your interest. You will practice what you already know and also learn new words; you will improve your grammar without realizing it. Tell me what your interests are and we begin!

tutorTags.description: ¿estas interesado en aprender sobre autores, escritores y literatura hispana? Llegaste al lugar indicado, soy aficionada de la lectura, y estudio una carrera de Castellano y literatura, disfrutemos juntos descubrir interesantes obras literarias.
Soy de Venezuela, un país de sur américa, así que estoy calificada para enseñarte cuales son las expresiones más comunes, modismos y coloquialismos del español en los países latinoamericanos.

Bajo un enfoque comunicativo, divertido y dinámico, aprenderás todas las competencias lingüísticas del español, incluyendo parte de la cultura y modismos de países hispanos, aprenderás a entender porque los nativos decimos lo que decimos
Durante un curso intensivo de español podrás mejorar todas las competencias del idioma
te ayudaré a mejorar tu expresión oral y nivel de conversación a través de un enfoque comunicativo

My classes are dynamic, entertaining and adapted to the interests of the student.

seoReview.author: Sarah
seoReview.content: With Teresa it is a combination of learning grammar and new vocabulary and then actually using it when speaking about interesting and various topics each lesson. Having had lessons with Teresa for the past few weeks I can for sure say that she is the best Spanish tutor i've ever had (and I had quite a few). It is only with her that I started really talking and have no fear of it. She is very attentive, professional and adjusts the lessons to your needs, preferences and interests, which is very important for the lessons to be engaging and encouraging to speak. She knows a lot about sports and she is quite funny!

105443.shortBio:
Hi everyone!
My name is Carolina. However, most people call me Carito. I am a Spanish teacher for foreigners and I am from Colombia. My mother tongue is Spanish. I have also learned French, Italian, Portuguese and English.
I have experience as a Spanish teacher at the university and language institutes.

tutorTags.description: I am from Colombia. My experience teaching foreigners and living abroad has let me be more conscious of my culture and language.

While I was living in Oslo, I had the opportunity to share with people from Spain. I could learn a lot about their culture and even language. I have learned vocabulary and expressions from different Spanish speaker countries.

While I was living in Oslo, I had the opportunity to share with people from all over Latin America. I could learn a lot about their culture and even language. I have learned vocabulary and expressions from different Spanish speaker countries.
I was responsible for the preparation and implementation of Spanish courses in multicultural classrooms.
I have also been in charge of preparing Spanish lessons for those people who needed to learn fast and efficiently.
I love to help my students to start this journey of learning a new language. I give the best of me for them to learn and have fun.

I love motivating my students to communicate and learn from mistakes. I also like to conduct my teaching as much as possible in Spanish so that the students can have more contact with the language. Students can be immersed in the language from day one.
While I was teaching Spanish for foreigners at Sergio Arboleda University, I have prepared my students to present DELE A1, A2, B1

484076.headline: Certified by the Cervantes Institute as a teacher of Spanish as a foreign language (ELE)
484076.shortBio:
If you are viewing my profile, it is because you are interested in learning Spanish. Welcome!
My name is Marta and I am certified by the Instituto Cervantes as a teacher of Spanish as a foreign language (ELE). I also have a Bachelor of Business Science and a Master of Taxation from the University of Cantabria in Spain.

tutorTags.description: Soy española nacida en el norte de España.

If you are learning Spanish and would like to use it in the professional environment, it is very possible that you will have to attend classes for specific purposes, in this case for business, for work, for the business environment in general.

There are some things you are not going to learn in a general Spanish class. You need other skills:

Understand and know how to use the vocabulary of your sector.
Negotiate and debate with your colleagues, bosses, clients and suppliers about prices, deliveries or conditions.
Understand technical texts, reports or articles.
Have long conversations on the phone or Skype.
Write letters and emails in a formal way.
Know the customs and social norms of the Spanish-speaking countries applied in the company.

The objective is that the student can move with ease in the world of the company, and that implies knowing much more than grammar and everyday vocabulary.

If your main reason for studying this language is professional, I advise you to take Spanish classes for business. The grammar is the same, but you will learn specific vocabulary and the exercises will be developed in the context of the company.

The classes will be adjusted to your true purposes. That will keep you motivated and you will be able to make faster progress in Spanish to achieve your professional goals.

Puedo ofrecerte un curso de preparación del DELE. El curso de preparación para el examen DELE B1, como el resto de los cursos de preparación para superar el diploma de español, tiene un diseño instructivo específico para la adquisición de habilidades y estrategias para la superación de las pruebas que lo componen. Si estás interesado, preguntame.

Ich kann Ihnen einen DELE-Vorbereitungskurs anbieten. Der DELE B1-Prüfungsvorbereitungskurs verfügt wie die übrigen Vorbereitungskurse zum Bestehen des spanischen Diploms über ein spezifisches Lehrdesign für den Erwerb von Fähigkeiten und Strategien zum Bestehen der Tests, aus denen er besteht. Wenn Sie interessiert sind, fragen Sie mich.

I can offer you a DELE preparation course. The DELE B1 exam preparation course, like the rest of the preparation courses to pass the Spanish diploma, has a specific instructional design for the acquisition of skills and strategies to pass the tests that comprise it. If you are interested, ask me.
Si necesitas un curso intensivo, no hay problema. Hablamos de tus objetivos y  metas
Doy clases desde un nivel A1 hasta el C2. Todos los comienzos cuestan un poco pero no te preocupes, seguimos el ritmo que necesites para que quites el miedo a empezar a expresarte en español.
También podemos hablar de libros, películas, series, música, etc.. Me adapto a las necesidades que tengas en el español.

Como madre y profesora particular entiendo las necesidades de los niños y jóvenes. La didáctica de la clase es diferente a la del adulto y por lo tanto mis clases están adaptados a ellos. Jugamos on juegos, usamos tarjetas con vocabulario, láminas, títeres, etc...
Podemos hablar y profundizar en la Literatura española y latinoamericana.

Estudiantes de todos los niveles que deseen  desarrollar y mejorar sus habilidades para desenvolverse con el español en distintas situaciones. Trabajaremos la expresión oral , la escrita, así como la compresión lectora con material interactivo y dinámico.

Schüler aller Niveaus, die ihre Fähigkeiten entwickeln und verbessern möchten, um mit Spanisch in verschiedenen Situationen fertig zu werden. Wir werden mit mündlichem und schriftlichem Ausdruck sowie Leseverständnis mit interaktivem und dynamischem Material arbeiten.

Students of all levels who wish to develop and improve their skills to cope with Spanish in different situations. We will work on oral and written expression, as well as reading comprehension with interactive and dynamic material.

Si estás aprendiendo español y te gustaría utilizarlo en el entorno profesional, es muy posible que debas asistir a clases  para fines específicos, en este caso para negocios, para el trabajo, para el ámbito empresarial en general. Aquí puedo ayudarte. Soy diplomada en ciencias empresariales y trabajo como Marketing Managerin en el mundo de la robótica en Alemania.

Hay algunas cosas que no vas a aprender en una clase de español general. Necesitas otras habilidades:

Entender y saber utilizar el vocabulario propio de tu sector.
Negociar y debatir con tus colegas, jefes, clientes y proveedores sobre precios, entregas o condiciones.
Comprender textos, informes o artículos técnicos.
Mantener conversaciones largas por teléfono o por Skype.
Redactar cartas y correos electrónicos de forma formal.
Conocer las costumbres y normas sociales de los países hispanohablantes aplicadas en la empresa.

El objetivo es que el estudiante pueda moverse con soltura en el mundo de la empresa, y eso implica saber mucho más que gramática y vocabulario de uso cotidiano.

Si tu principal motivo para estudiar este idioma es profesional, yo te aconsejo que tomes clases de español para negocios. La gramática es la misma, pero aprenderás vocabulario específico y los ejercicios se desarrollarán en el contexto de la empresa.

Las clases se ajustarán a tus verdaderos propósitos. Eso te mantendrá motivado y podrás hacer progresos más rápidos en español para que alcances tus objetivos profesionales.

Wenn Sie Spanisch lernen und es im beruflichen Umfeld anwenden möchten, ist es sehr wahrscheinlich, dass Sie Kurse für bestimmte Zwecke besuchen müssen, in diesem Fall für Unternehmen, für die Arbeit, für das Geschäftsumfeld im Allgemeinen.

Es gibt einige Dinge, die Sie in einem allgemeinen Spanischkurs nicht lernen werden. Sie benötigen andere Fähigkeiten:

Verstehen und wissen, wie Sie das Vokabular Ihrer Branche verwenden.
Verhandeln und diskutieren Sie mit Ihren Kollegen, Vorgesetzten, Kunden und Lieferanten über Preise, Lieferungen oder Bedingungen.
Technische Texte, Berichte oder Artikel verstehen.
Führen Sie lange Gespräche am Telefon oder über Skype.
Schreiben Sie Briefe und E-Mails auf formelle Weise.
Kennen Sie die Bräuche und sozialen Normen der spanischsprachigen Länder, die im Unternehmen angewendet werden.

Das Ziel ist, dass sich der Schüler problemlos in der Unternehmenswelt bewegen kann, und dies setzt voraus, dass er viel mehr als nur Grammatik und alltägliches Vokabular kennt.

Wenn Ihr Hauptgrund für das Erlernen dieser Sprache professionell ist, empfehle ich Ihnen, an Business-Spanischkursen teilzunehmen. Die Grammatik ist dieselbe, aber Sie lernen ein spezifisches Vokabular und die Übungen werden im Kontext des Unternehmens entwickelt.

Die Klassen werden an Ihre wahren Zwecke angepasst. Das wird Sie motivieren und Sie werden in der Lage sein, schneller Fortschritte auf Spanisch zu machen, um Ihre beruflichen Ziele zu erreichen.


If you are learning Spanish and would like to use it in the professional environment, it is very possible that you will have to attend classes for specific purposes, in this case for business, for work, for the business environment in general.

There are some things you are not going to learn in a general Spanish class. You need other skills:

Understand and know how to use the vocabulary of your sector.
Negotiate and debate with your colleagues, bosses, clients and suppliers about prices, deliveries or conditions.
Understand technical texts, reports or articles.
Have long conversations on the phone or Skype.
Write letters and emails in a formal way.
Know the customs and social norms of the Spanish-speaking countries applied in the company.

The objective is that the student can move with ease in the world of the company, and that implies knowing much more than grammar and everyday vocabulary.

If your main reason for studying this language is professional, I advise you to take Spanish classes for business. The grammar is the same, but you will learn specific vocabulary and the exercises will be developed in the context of the company.

The classes will be adjusted to your true purposes. That will keep you motivated and you will be able to make faster progress in Spanish to achieve your professional goals.

seoReview.author: Whitney
seoReview.content: She's a fantastic teacher! She's very professional and you always learn a lot with her! I'm happy to continue classes with her :-)

tutorTags.description:
Al enseñar reglas gramaticales y/o vocabulario enfocado a su área de trabajo.
Teaching gramatical rules and or vocabulary focused on your line of work

Capacitando  Maestros y Doctores docentes de grados universitarios de diversas culturas y costumbres. 
I have trained University professors as well as government employees to hone their teaching skills and their professional development. They have all been from various backgrounds, cultures and customs.

Enfocado a personas que desean comunicarse al vivir o visitar un país de habla hispana. 
If you would like to visit, work or study in a Spanish-speaking country I can help you with that

Utilizando música, imágenes, películas entre otros materiales didácticos para facilitar su aprendizaje.
Using music, images, movies and other teaching tools to make learning fun and easy.

Enfoque al área que se requiera, por ejemplo desarrollé un curso de Inglés para Recursos Humanos, que es mi fuerte.
I focus on whatever field is needed such as Human Resources.

Usando variantes de una palabras dentro del idioma español en centro y Sudamérica. 
Examining the different variations of a word on each country or even in the same country. 
For example: in Mexico a boy is niño and in El Salvador is called sipote

Tanto reglas gramaticales como español de la calle.
Using more structured “grammatical Spanish” and or informal

Utilizando imágenes, sonidos y objetos. 
Using pictures, visual aids, sounds, music and videos, making it as real as possible.

697948.headline: Certified Native Spanish Tutor
697948.shortBio:
Hola!! I am very happy to be parte of Preply Tutors Community!! I invite you to learn general Spanish (grammar), conversational Spanish, business Spanish, and Spanish for traveling. I have experience working with children and adults. 
My first experience teaching Spanish was in the United States in 2003 at an elementary school in Washington State.

tutorTags.description: I am a native Spanish speaker from Colombia, and understand that Colombian Spanish is not only about the dialect spoken in Bogotá, but it should be considered the dialects spoken in the rest of the country.
I am from Colombia and also teach linguistic expressions associated with the Latin culture.

I have gone through the process of learning languages ​​other than my mother tongue, so I understand about methods that can serve different types of learning and different profiles of learners, whether they are children or adults.

I lived three years in the United States and I usually tutored children and adults in my time off work. After that, I´ve  been teaching some friends with a mother tongue other than Spanish, without knowledge of Spanish beyond saying hola, muy bien o adiós.
I encourage my students to speak from the first class and find any opportunity at all times to think in Spanish and to practice the vocabulary or the topics learned.
My main experience in the early years teaching Spanish was with children between the ages of 4 and 12.

I have worked in business related areas such as education, technology, hospitality, for more than twelve years, in different positions: Hotel clerk, Elementary School teacher, Software consultant, Business consultant, Project manager, Research analyst, etc. I can help you with either basic business knowledge or a deeper understanding of Business Spanish structures.

862426.headline: Professional tutor 6 years experience
862426.shortBio: Good morning everyone! My name is eric I am a professor of philosophy and an educator. I really enjoy teaching and sharing knowledge about Hispanic culture in Latin America. I'm very interested in art and technological innovation, sometimes I work on projects in software factories with educational projects that add written and spoken Spanish.

tutorTags.description:
Como materia, puedo proporcionarte
* Conversaciones de Español constante
* Las conjugaciones gramaticales, 
* Consonantes, fonemas 
* las relaciones como las acentuaciones, comas y redacción de textos de orden sistemático. 
* Aprenderás la comprensión lectora,  análisis de textos.
* Identificación de conceptos. 
*  Identificación de las ideas principales
* Reglas de la ortografía
* División Silábica
* Las mayúsculas
* La teoría
* Acentos diacríticos y enfáticos
* Signos de puntuación.
* Categoría Gramaticales
* Expresión Oral
* Etimología
* Locuciones Latinas

El Español para profesionales, Puedo proporcionarte una connotación de ir mejorando el léxico y las dicciones,  tener las bases para una buena oratoria, disertación, informes detallados o una buena retórica en tus discursos de manera rigurosa. 

*Aprenderás la diferencias de las premisas con las explicaciones, los artículos, los verbos y los adjetivos que conlleva un escrito. 
*realizaremos análisis de textos, 
*comprensión lectora, 
* Práctica conversacional con tutor,
* Filosofía en español latinoamericano
* Pronunciación. 
* Conjugación de preposiciones gramaticales. 
* Citas Bibliográficas

El Español General puedo propiciar las habilidades para obtener un acercamiento al habla cotidiano con las conversaciones interpersonales, también aprenderás a conjugar las palabras y ver sus significados de acuerdo a las similitudes de tu cultura o país.

Aprenderás lo básico,  
* Identificando las variantes de las letras y la diferencia de las vocales,  la identificación de los sonidos que cada uno produce llamado, consonante.
* Identificarás el sonido de las Vocales que se conjugan con las letras.
* Diálogo con el Tutor nivel básico de concepto. 
*  Lectura de textos 
* Escritura de conceptos.

*Práctica constante del Español con argumentos
*  Práctica de Español cultural
* Práctica de Español latinoamericano Regionalismo
* Concepto básicos de la cultura latinoamericana

* Realización de Informes con orden gramatical
* Asesoramiento de las conceptualización básica del español

seoSnippet.shortBio: Good morning everyone! My name is eric I am a professor of philosophy and an educator. I really enjoy teaching and sharing knowledge about Hispanic culture in Latin America. I'm very interested in art and technological innovation, sometimes I work on projects in software factories with educational projects that add written and spoken Spanish.

seoSnippetOriginal.shortBio: Hola a todos! mi nombre es Erick soy profesor de filosofía, y pedagogo,  me gusta mucho enseñar y compartir el conocimiento de la cultura de habla hispana en latinoamericana.  Soy muy apasionado del arte y también de la innovación en la tecnología, en ocasiones realizo colaboraciones en proyectos en fábricas de software con diseños instruccionales que añaden lenguaje escrito y oral de español.

2126438.headline: 10 years experience of teaching both Spanish and Chinese to foreigners
2126438.shortBio: Hi everyone, this is Aitana,  I  finished both my undergraduate and master's studies at the Complutense University of Madrid. Iwas admitted by Huawei Spainish Representative Office to continue my work in Spain. In my spare time, I also taught spanish and chinese for foreigners from different countries.

tutorTags.description:
Spanish courses for all the levels from A1-B2
教授西班牙语A1-B2的所有课程

The B1 level of Spanish corresponds to the third level of the six levels of the European Common Reference Standard for languages.

In this level B1, you will be able to independently express your opinions in Spanish and can communicate using basic sentence patterns, understand basic topics related to work, study, hobbies, etc., can fully express their thoughts, wishes and plans, and simply describe an event or experience.

In this level we will use my exclusive self-made powerpoints and you will have corresponding exercises to practice after classes as well if you want.

西班牙语B1水平对应的是欧洲语言共同参照标准六个级别中的第三个级别，属于西班牙语中高级水平，能进行日常交流。拥有b1证书，可以去西语国家读预科，应对基本工作。

西班牙语B1级别证书的拥有者可以独立运用西班牙语表达自己的观点，并可以运用基本句式进行交流。

能够理解有关工作、学习、爱好等方面的基本主题，可以完整的表达自己的想法、愿望和计划，简单的描述一个事件、一次经历。

在这一级别，我们将使用我独家自制的powerpoint，课后也会有相应的配套练习。

The Spanish B2 level corresponds to the fourth level among the six levels of the European Common Reference Standard for Languages.

Achieving Spanish B2 level means that learners can communicate effortlessly with native Spanish speakers; be able to actively participate in technical discussions in their professional field in Spanish; be able to write clearly on a wide range of topics in Spanish , Detailed documents and no pressure to study in a Spanish-speaking country for graduate school.

In this level we will use my exclusive self-made powerpoints and you will have corresponding exercises to practice after classes as well if you want.

西班牙语B2水平对应的是欧洲语言共同参照标准六个级别中的第四个级别，属于高级水平，学习者搭建完成了语法体系，达到工作、学习高阶应用水平。

达到西班牙语B2水平意味着学习者可以与以西语为母语的人毫不费力地进行交流；能够用西语积极地参加自己专业领域内的技术性讨论；能够使用西语针对广泛的题材写出清楚、详尽的文件；能够理解比较复杂的书面文件及内容；并在多人的交谈中能够自然流利地表达自己的意见，胜任西语工作，赴西语国家留学读研上课无压力。

The Spanish A1-A2 level corresponds to the first level of the six levels of the European Common Reference Standard for Languages. 

In this Level  for Spanish Beginners, you will be able to pronounce the Spanish Alphabet and simple vocabularies， understand and use very basic sentences for simple communication, introduce yourself and others, ask and answer personal questions, and communicate briefly when the other person is slow and clear.

In this level we will use my exclusive self-made powerpoints and you will have corresponding exercises to practice after classes as well.

西班牙语A1-A2级别对应欧洲语言共同参考标准六级中的第一级。

在本级西班牙语初学者中，您将能够发音西班牙语字母和简单词汇，理解和使用非常基本的句子进行简单的交流，介绍自己和他人，提出和回答个人问题，并在对方不在时进行简短的交流缓慢而清晰。

在这一级别，我们将使用我独家自制的powerpoint，课后也会有相应的配套练习。

In this Spanish conversation class you will be able to practice the  listening and speaking in spanish, we will try to comunicate 100% in this language.

在西班牙语的听力对话口语课中，我们将会尽量100%用纯西语进行听力对话练习，感受纯正的西语语言环境。在这一级别，我们将使用我独家自制的powerpoint，课后也会有相应的配套练习。

In these special courses, we will summarize all the grammere which we studied from level A1 to B2 and prepare for the corresponding level for official examination DELE.

在这些专项课程中，我们会总结我们从A1级到B2级学习的所有语法，并为相应级别的官方考试DELE做准备。

Special courses and prepared powerpoints for kids who want to learn Spanish
独家生动有趣少儿课件帮助儿童学习西班牙语

Special courses and prepared powerpoints for business people who want to learn Spanish
We will study exclusive Economics and MBA words

976851.headline: Te enseñare a hablar como nativo
976851.shortBio:
¿Quieres mejorar tu español?
Mi nombre es Samantha soy venezolana y vivo actualmente en argentina.
Tengo experiencia en la enseñanza de español para extranjeros. Me gusta enseñar, conocer nuevas culturas y personas de todo el mundo.
Mi objetivo es que tengas clases naturales y dinámicas con una metodología muy fácil donde haremos conversatorios sobre diferentes temas que sean de tu interés.

seoReview.author: Steven
seoReview.content: Very good. Would recommend

tutorTags.description: In our lessons I will make you feel comfortable with making mistakes, with my experience also learning languages, making mistakes is part of the process. We will start from grammar, pronunciation and vocabulary, soon you will feel more comfortable speaking Spanish.

If you are a beginner level, I will help you from the basics. With me I will make you feel comfortable when making mistakes, with my experience also learning languages, making mistakes is part of the process. We will start from grammar, pronunciation and vocabulary, soon you will feel more comfortable speaking Spanish, which is my goal!

I have experience and a methodology that has given good results in learning in conversations, making my students feel comfortable when making mistakes but reaching a much more advanced level. In my talks you feel the need to talk more and more!

Learning a language online for children can be a bit difficult but my lessons with children (9-12 years old) are a lot of fun. We practice a lot of vocabulary with videos, songs, games and activities that you like the most. We also review a bit of grammar but in a much more fun way for them!

Many people only seek to learn a language with a specific vocabulary, all my lessons are personalized from the objective of my student, adapting to each of their needs in grammar, vocabulary and pronunciation.

1082189.shortBio: Hello! My name is Manuel, I am from Madrid and I currently live in Berlin. My great passion is learning and teaching languages. Since I started university I have worked as a Latin, Greek and Spanish teacher for high school students. Now, I have decided to change fields to dedicate myself to teaching Spanish for foreigners.

seoReview.author: Tim
seoReview.content: Manuel is a great teacher, his lessons are well structured and his materials are fun and interesting. I would recommend Manuel because he is a knowledgeable, experienced and patient teacher and I always enjoy my lessons with him.

75024.headline: Native Spanish (Castilian) teacher
75024.shortBio:
For the last two years I have been teaching Spanish online either on this platform or others, and these last months I have also been working as a Spanish transcriber for a project in Lionbridge.
I have been living abroad twice and therefore I am used to helping people around me understand or practice Spanish.

seoReview.author: Sean
seoReview.content:
I am a native English speaker and I have been taking Spanish lessons from Rebeca for a couple of months.  I have worked with several different Preply tutors over the last year, and Rebeca has been the best by far.

Rebeca speaks English at the level of a native speaker which makes the classes easy to understand and allows her to explain the differences between the two languages.

Rebeca is also very organized in her class preparation and presentation, and she creates a daily log to record what information is discussed during each class session.  I highly recommend Rebeca to any students looking to learn English or Spanish.

tutorTags.description: I can work focusing on grammar and work through it, either by my own program or by one suggested by the student.

Learning how to read Spanish, basic words, useful verbs...   the fist time I taught that I was 16, with a German friend in California =) It's quite easy, after a couple of rules you will always know how to pronounce Spanish.

I have been talking in Spanish since I was born (well, maybe some months later). And I talk a lot. ;)
Over 25 years of experience having conversations in Spanish.
For students who have a really low level but want to start talking right away, I use texts and get through them, and only use the grammar when needed.

I am used to helping children learn in general. I have worked for 8 months as au pair and I helped the children (Finnish-Italian) to learn English and Spanish while communicating in a mixture of all four languages! It was definitely fun =)
I am a native European Spanish speaker. Born and raised in Madrid, but lived in California (USA) and now in Tampere, Finland.

ESPAÑOL/SPANISH/ESPANYOL
Hola estudiantes! Me llamo Aina. Soy de Barcelona, pero actualmente vivo en la capital de España, Madrid. Me encanta hablar sobre arte, música, viajes, comida, conocer nuevas culturas y estoy abierta a nuevos temas de conversación.

tutorTags.description: Clases adaptadas a las necesidades de cada alumno
Aprender desde 0 con conocimientos básicos y así tener una buena base del idioma, para que pocos poco sea más fácil aprender.
Hablar de cualquier tema para que tu fluidez en las conversaciones puede mejorar, y de esta manera cosas más seguridad al hablar en el idioma.
Clases más didácticas y aprendiendo a través de juegos, para que las clases sean mucho más educativas y estimulantes.

seoReview.content: Ms. Luisa is an incredible instructor and very patient and friendly. Great energy!

1126468.headline: Spanish teacher for foreigners
1126468.shortBio:
Hello, I'm Romina, a Spanish teacher in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
If you want to learn or improve Spanish, I offer one-to-one classes tailored to your learning needs.
Are you having trouble expressing yourself orally? You can take conversation courses with general or technical vocabulary expansion, improve your pronunciation and review the necessary grammar.

seoReview.author: Josh
seoReview.content: Romina is super friendly and works incredibly hard. She puts a lot of effort into writing up lesson plans with you according to what you want to learn, she's always very well-prepared with great lesson material and exercises, and she's always willing to stop and discuss things that might require a bit more explanation. She's really accommodating and overall a pleasure to work with

tutorTags.description: Leemos juntos el libro elegido por el alumno. Estudiamos gramática, significado de las frases. Biografía del autor.
Español hablado en Argentina.
Clases acordes a las necesidades. Estudiamos gramática, la vemos aplicada en muestras, hacemos ejercicios guiados y ejercicios libres donde cada alumno puede desplegar al máximo sus conocimientos.
Clases acordes a las necesidades. A partir de muestras de lengua se estudia la gramática. Material extra de ser solicitado por el alumno.
Clases acordes a las necesidades. A partir de muestras de lengua se estudia la gramática.
Conversación general, simulación de situaciones reales, ampliación de vocabulario. Soporte de gramática y pronunciación.

2433852.headline: Native Spanish tutor, certified in ELE, 1.5 years of experience and C1 in English
2433852.shortBio:
Hello everybody!
Welcome to my profile, my name is Paco and I am a native Spanish speaker.
I have been teaching Spanish conversation classes for a year and I would like to help you improve your Spanish in a fun and entertaining way. We can also start from the most basic levels to gradually improve your level.

seoReview.author: Duane
seoReview.content: Paco is an excellent tutor. He is very personable, respectful, and passionate about teaching. So glad to have him as my Spanish tutor, and I eagerly look forward to each class.

tutorTags.description: Si estás preparando el examen SIELE, podremos trabajar la preparación del examen oral simulando la estructura del examen y aplicar diferentes estrategias de desarrollo para ésta parte del examen.
Si estás interesado en el Español por motivos laborales o profesionales practicaremos situaciones en las que pudieses necesiitar practicar tu Español para ganar fluidez y confianza.
Clases con un acentro neutro, lo cual hara mas mas sencilla la comunicación.
Trataremos cualquier tema en el cual el alumno esté interesado, estoy abierto a sugerencias en cualquier momento.
Si necesitas correcciones en redacciones también podremos revisarlas y trabajar en ello.

Si tu nivel es muy basico,o simplemente quieres empezar desde lo mas básico, podremos empezar trabajando las cosas mas básicas con explicaciones en ingles, para poco a poco ir aumentando de nivel. Todo enfocado a mejorar tus habilidades orales en esta bonita lengua.
Mas de un año enseñando Español On-line a varios alumnos de Estados Unidos, además de experiencia en clases presenciales con alumnos de diferentes nacionalidades.

Si estás preparando el examen DELE, podremos trabajar la preparación del examen oral simulando la estructura del examen y aplicar diferentes estrategias de desarrollo para ésta temida parte del examen.

seoSnippet.shortBio:

Welcome to my profile, my name is Paco and I am a native Spanish speaker.
I have been teaching Spanish conversation classes for a year and I would like to help you improve your Spanish in a fun and entertaining way. We can also start from the most basic levels to gradually improve your level.

1654972.headline: Highly qualified Spanish teacher with 7 years of experience
1654972.shortBio: Hello! I’m Mariel and I live in Caracas (Venezuela). I studied translation and interpretation at the Central University of Venezuela (UCV) and I have been a professor for 7 years. I teach English, French and Spanish. Besides, I specialize in French grammar.

seoReview.author: RJ
seoReview.content: Mariel is very helpful in helping you read and write in Spanish. I am sure she is good for other things too but we have worked a lot on translating texts as well as reading Harry Potter in Spanish together. Thanks!

tutorTags.description: Desde hace 5 meses, he estado preparando a estudiantes para que presenten el examen DELE. Las clases están orientadas a desarrollar las 4 habilidades comunicativas: comprensión oral y escrita y expresión oral y escrita.
Clases que abordan temas gramaticales, ejercicios y conversaciones acordes al nivel del estudiante.
Clases que están orientadas a los intereses de los estudiantes (escritura, gramática, lectura, pronunciación).
Clases en las que el estudiante principiante aprende a iniciar conversaciones, presentarse e identificar los elementos de su entorno. Asimismo, las clases contienen temas de gramática.
Clases conversacionales sobre diversos temas (cultura, turismo, gastronomía, entre otros) en las que el estudiante amplia su vocabulario y expresa su punto de vista.
Clases de traducción español-inglés, inglés-español, español-francés, francés-español. Clases de expresión oral y escrita y de comprensión oral y escrita.
Clases sobre temas de gramática complejos dirigidos a estudiantes avanzados en las que el estudiante pone a prueba sus conocimientos mediante la realización de ejercicios.

seoSnippet.shortBio: Hello! I’m Mariel and I live in Caracas (Venezuela). I studied translation and interpretation at the Central University of Venezuela (UCV) and I have been a professor for 7 years. I teach English, French and Spanish. Besides, I specialize in French grammar.

HEIRA  IS  very kind very friendly and has lots patience she has a genuine heart to want to make sure that you  with her help can achieve your goal which for me is to become fluent in this beautiful  spanish language I have given her 5 stars only because  this is the maximum I can give on preply I believe she will be worth more than her weight in gold as

2813865.headline: Native Spanish Tutor
2813865.shortBio:
Hello everyone!
My name is Angelica, I am from Colombia, I like to go to the movies, play sports and read.
I love to travel, that is my passion.
I have been a teacher for 3 years.
I'm a teacher of English as a Foreign Language
Teaching is my passion!

tutorTags.description: Explora Latinoamérica, a través de una profesora nativa es único. Conocerás sus costumbres, sus ciudades, su forma de vivir, sus dialectos... e.t.c. Si deseas pasar una temporada en este territorio, sea cual sea el destino que elijas, ya podrás hablar con nativos sin ningún inconveniente.

Está diseñado para los estudiantes que quieran comunicarse lo más rápido posible y que quieran experimentar la cultura de un país hispanohablante, mejorando tus habilidades comunicativas y tu fluidez e independencia en español.

Aquí aprenderás el uso esencial del idioma como: presentación, vocabulario básico y frases de uso cotidiano. Las clases se centrarán en cómo hacer preguntas, construir oraciones simples y conceptos básicos.

Con las conversaciones o dialogos cotidianos podras descubrir un montón de expresiones y vocabulario de la vida diaria que podrás utilizar cuando hables con alguien en español y quieras sonar como un nativo.
Aqui desarrollaremos las habilidades comunicativas de lectura, escritura, escucha y expresión oral a través de actividades, juegos y didacticas que ayuden al niño a entender mejor el idioma

456238.headline: More than 10 years of experience in teaching languages
456238.shortBio:
Knowledge and experience.
Personal methodology adapted to each person. Many years of experience in teaching languages to students of all ages and leves. I speak French, English and I master all the secrets of the Spanish language. Teaching and learning are my passions.

seoReview.author: Romain
seoReview.content: Como profesora, Manuela tiene todo ló que buscaba : experiencia, paciencia, humor y mucha amabilidad.

tutorTags.description: Soy una profesional de la lengua, Filóloga y Traductora. Conozco muy bien mi idioma y me muevo con soltura en cualquier campo profesional.
Para lo que necesites, sea cual sea tu objetivo, solo necesitas tener ganas, del resto me encargo yo...
Si necesitas aprender rápidamente, puedes contar conmigo. Tú marcas el ritmo.

Si tu nivel de español es todavía inicial, no te preocupes,  tengo mucha experiencia con personas principiantes, me adapto a tu ritmo, y puedo proporcionarte una base sólida para que tu español despegue...
Conmigo podrás practicar tu español, tengas el nivel que tengas.  A hablar se aprende hablando...
Si lo que necesitas es aprender o mejorar tu español en tu vida profesional, te aseguro que con mis clases alcanzarás tus objetivos de forma práctica y muy eficaz.

2425550.headline: Investigador y profesor con más de 25 años de experiencia
2425550.shortBio:
Hola, me llamo José Antonio; soy de nacionalidad mexicana, nací en la Ciudad de México y la mayor parte de mi vida la he vivido ahí; pero tuve la oportunidad de vivir en Pátzcuaro, Michoacán y en Ciudad Victoria, Tamaulipas.  
En mi trayectoria profesional he trabajado como investigador y profesor ...

tutorTags.description:
Soy profesionista: investigador, profesor y gestor con una amplia trayectoria en este ámbito; por lo tanto, es en el sector profesional donde sin duda alguna podré aportar y ayudar de manera significa a las personas jóvenes y adultas que estén estudiando una carrera o un posgrado; así como también aquellos que desempeñen una función profesional. 
Conozco el sector profesional desde los componentes esenciales que lo integran: la investigación, la docencia, la difusión de la cultura y la gestión. 
Como investigador he desarrollo 10 investigaciones individuales y 17 colaborativas. Las líneas de investigación que trabajo son: inclusión/exclusión en el sistema educativo; atención educativa a sectores vulnerables; sociología de la educación; indicadores sociodemográficos.  
Como profesor he impartido 22 cursos en licenciatura; 5 cursos en maestría y 3 en doctorado. En los últimos cinco años he dado clases de Planeación educativa, Economía de la educación, Filosofía de la educación, Pedagogía contemporánea; Neuroeducación; Seminario de Política educativa, Currículum e Innovación y Seminario de Fundamentos de política educativa, Gestión y Desarrollo institucional. 
En esta labor de formación he dirigido tesis, asesorado a jóvenes de servicio social y participado como jurado en la presentación de exámenes profesionales y de grado.
Referente a la difusión de la cultura y el conocimiento he participado como conferencista con 39 presentaciones, 5 de las cuales fueron a nivel internacional. He organizado de 4 eventos académicos, 1 de los ellos también de nivel internacional.
Soy autor de 3 libros (uno publicado, otro en producción y un tercero en dictamen); de 3 capítulos de libro, de 6 artículos, de 2 presentaciones en Memorias de Congresos internacionales; de 2 Sitios web (coordinador de los sitios donde se presentaron resultados de investigación).
Como gestor coordiné actividades de gestión académico-administrativa para dar seguimiento a la atención educativa de los niños jornaleros agrícolas migrantes trabajando con docentes, personal técnico y autoridades educativas en diferentes niveles. En este rol desarrollé un sistema de información de administración escolar y estuvo bajo mi supervisión la realización de investigaciones. Asimismo, realice actividades de investigación y evaluación de programas educativos y sistemas de indicadores y tengo experiencia internacional al trabajar para el Centro de Cooperación Regional para la Educación de Adultos en América Latina y el Caribe (CREFAL).

Soy mexicano, por lo tanto manejo el español que podría denominarse latinoamericano. Por otra parte, como investigador y profesor tienes que conocer y remitirte a la literatura especializada sobre algún tema, ya sea porque es material para la investigación o la enseñanza y en América Latina hay muchos temas de interés que involucran a los países de la región, de tal manera que siempre se está en contacto con el empleo del español en latinoamericana a través de reportes, iniciativas, resultados de investigación, conferencias y decretos entre otras fuentes de comunicación.

Como ya señalé, he laborado como investigador y profesor por 25 años; esto remite necesariamente al uso intensivo del español todos los días, ya sea porque imparte clases, dictas conferencias, asesoras a estudiantes, escribes para difundir el conocimiento producto de la investigación a través de libros, artículos, capítulos de libros, conferencias, reportes técnicos, sitios web. En esta labor de investigación y docencia siempre el uso del español es intenso, forma parte ineludible de tu trabajo; de tal manera que estoy acostumbrado a este tipo de uso.

Mi trayectoria académica como investigador y profesor me han permitido desarrollar excelentes habilidades comunicativas. He impartido clases por más de 20 años en los niveles de licenciatura, maestría y doctorado; dictado conferencias a nivel nacional e internacional dirigidas estudiantes, profesores, académicos, investigadores y público en general. Como gestor en instituciones del sector público he coordinado el trabajo del personal técnico y trabajado con autoridades educativas en diferentes niveles.
De tal manera que tengo excelentes habilidades comunicativas, un manejo del lenguaje tanto académico como del sector público; sin dejar de lado el cotidiano. En este contexto, por supuesto que se dirigirme al público y hablar frente a él sin problema; habilidades que me gustaría transmitir, compartir y desarrollar en los estudiantes.

1881384.shortBio:
Hello, my name is Miguel, I'm from Colombia and I'm a native Spanish speaker. I have hundreds of hours of experience teaching Spanish online. I speak English and Portuguese, so, I know myself the struggles of learning a new language.
On the professional side, I have a degree in international ...

seoReview.author: BertJan
seoReview.content:
I've been trying to learn Spanish for 4 years through private lessons, intensive courses and self-study and unfortunately without significant results. Until I took lessons with Miguel and achieved more results in a few weeks than in 4 years. Miguel is a nice and reliable teacher who feels unerringly what is the best learning process for you and who adjusts the program accordingly.  And with astonishing results. The lessons are enjoyable, and Miguel knows how to explain the essence of the Spanish language in an amazingly entertaining and pleasant way that makes you wonder why it was so difficult in the past.


As said, Miguel is a fantastic teacher. He is always helpful, very patient and kind
He makes the lessons dynamic and fun in a nice flow. Every time I'm surprised how eager he is to tailor the lessons to my (learning) needs, with amazing progress. I would recommend him as a teacher 110% and even 
recommended him to my daughter, who is also very enthusiastic and makes great progress.

tutorTags.description: Native Colombian speaker, with years of experience in jobs related to the use of the language.

As a Latin American myself, and someone who has to work with different varieties of the Spanish language, I am able to help you understand and adapt to the different dialects of Latin America, nevertheless, my specialty is Colombian Spanish.
I'm a certified teacher of Spanish as a Foreign Language (ELE), and have experience in online teaching and other Spanish studies including translation.

My approach is 100% from a communicative perspective, you will be making sentences from day 1 even if you don't have any previous knowledge of Spanish, and we will learn some basic skills to advance as quickly as possible through the Spanish language.

As an esports commentator, my job is to speak clearly and be able to communicate in an effective way with people from different Spanish-speaking countries, and be able to keep a conversation flowing.

These skills make me an appropriate person to help you develop your conversational skills, including confidence and flow.

754914.headline: Translator, native spanish speaker
754914.shortBio:
Hi! My name is florencia, I’ve been studying english all my life, it was mandatory at first, but at some point it became my hobbie, I guess I wanted to understand english speakers without the need of a third party. You know the term lost in translation, well I don't like losing things! So I decided I wanted to translate, so that there are less things lost for other people! 
.

seoReview.author: Ola
seoReview.content:
Florencia has a genuine interest in teaching and wanting me to improve my Spanish. She is always very patient, listening, paying attention and correcting me when needed. I never feel any stress with Florencia. She creates a comfortable, relaxed and creative enviroment, building my confidence in speaking Spanish. 

The lessons with Florencia are always very well prepared but she is also very flexible and can adjust the lesson depending on what I want to learn at the moment. She is very professional and easy to understand. She speaks fluent English.

It is amazing how much I learn every time and I always look forward to our lessons.
I get more and more intrested in learning spanish for each session we have. 

I give Florencia my best recommendations and I can promise you that you will be happy with your choice if you chose her as your tutor. Give her a try, you wont regret it! :-)

tutorTags.description: I am from Argentina, we speak a version of castillian, so there is a slight difference from the rest of latin america!
I’ll give you notes and teach you the general rules of spanish, either to start learning or to freshen up!
Let’s start learning spanish! I won’t bombard you, we can take it slow!
I am a native spanish speaker, let’s have a conversation and I’ll help you become more fluent!
Let's talk business.
Spanish and latin american literature is so beautiful, I’ll introduce you to the magic realism, the poetic Jorge Luis Borges and more
I am a translator, I am trained to translate documents, articles and so on. I can help you!
Learning spanish as a kid is fun and it’s much easier!

Hello, I am Ignacio and I have more than 15 years of professional experience in the consulting and banking sectors.

seoReview.author: Luis
seoReview.content: Hola!. Quería dejar mi valoración positiva sobre Ignacio, porque la verdad, me ha gustado mucho como profesor. Ha estructurado perfectamente la clase, entendiendo desde un principio cuales eran mis necesidades y objetivos, y ha sabido adaptar perfectamente el contenido a mi nivel. Su metodología también me ha gustado mucho, pues se nota su experiencia en el mundo de la empresa. Un gran profesor sin duda!!!

tutorTags.description: conversations about the day to day: how to deal with family, friends, colleagues...

I have been speaking for almost 3 years with a Syrian student who lives in Spain. Our conversations are based on the personal and professional area. We have been focusing on how to cope with his daily routine; we have been developing skills, by simulating real scenes, in order to communicate efficiently with his family, friends and colleagues in his workplace.
I have been advising the trainee about how to find a job in Spain and we have been developing skills in order to get the most appropriate job, according to his profile and goals.
